1b1(1): rgya ga A d+ha/ a rnams bzhi tu nyidag dus pa na na tu/ nas pa sa byed/  sgrun tu zhes kyi'i thegs ra ban
1b2(1): bam yo ma panagangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phan pa de nya ma dngasas rgyas 'as pa nga/ daltar mabyon pa mas panas byud / 
1b3(1): bdag rnyis 'os pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i thong byer gyim 'bra' bsrung ba'i tshangs// dge 'aslong brgya myong gi dge slong gi ge 'dun chen po dang blams kyis tu bzhugs so// khung chub pom
1b4(1): ga sum khri gnyis stong dang sa bapas gcig ste// mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems yi gdapa' sems dpa' chen po mdzon pa shes ma chen na yongs su sbyangs pal la 'byung ba/ 
1b5(1): sa m+b+ha rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis rlabs pa/ chos kyi grong rung ba ma ponichos yongs su tha na pa sed pa'i ma chen thasngags pa/ gaphyogs ma
1b6(1): da 'grus pa rnamamapas nga gas da byug sapa dang / kyi TI 'jos pa sor padang u phyogs pa rdzu byams
2a1(1): ga ga sa da /  na/ zhan dadu byams par bca cung ban tu byung rgya chu myur rnas sa 'dan tham man pa smram rna mos mag dang brangs ba'i byiHngo ma
2a2(1): lus kyang rab tu 'dab zhing 'bru kun langs nas/ skad kyis pa nangs pa nam du dus do / de'i tshe la chen po dang / mi dacu ma tshol yang rag tu gsol zhing 'khrugs so// de nas sems can dedag nyis
2a3(1): dro ba ni dbya na gabang ba'i phyir 'digra du/ kye thog bor tu mya na pa byed par surang tu sgru batsho klong khyer byes bu gebs po rgya 'byung ba'i gams de bzhi ga bshAs dA dang 'dong pa bcid te
2a4(1): thams so po byag pas te/ re ba'i na zhenanapa mi'i kyi'anga' du / ben ma dge pa ba gcisas 'a mas 'dzubs kyi ni btsunas kyi nig su ra
2a5(1): byin du// 'dzi na shem ga sayong sbyi gi sa nga du
2a6(1): / 'dis rten gangs s+ho/ bya sa d+he samachad ni 'dzin dang sgrubs byed de/ nasun 'grong sa par kyang /  rnye/ de smon su byed ma com ldan 'das dang kyi thu sa / 
2a7(1): rno brten bu de dag kyad do// sangs rgyab kyi 'od kyis sa su kun 'ad nin myi 'thod pa nas kyi mdug ga gas kyis myom nam mo 'dreg sa ni dge bu'i rdzasas kya ma la
2a8(1): /  rjeg sangs du du ltang ng+ya bcu byed nas sa bab su bya da
2b1(1): mas cang rab tu dus bya/  rgyal po tshom bkar sna tha'acheb/ thong ba'i shes rab dang nang /  mngag gdon po ba/  ra gyi mtshol sa spo da kyipo songs du rnam dus/  'ang
2b2(1): da gesas sa su 'an / des bu'i ched byed pa'i yan tan da ma pa/ mas kyang bas rgyas kyims yang dag la no// da ca stsal med
2b3(1): yang sa rgyab kyi 'od kyis reg na hU~M/ gcig sa gcig 'di skad du/ grogs po dag byurang du kha lag 'khrug zhig ces swA ha'o// / de skad ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi ba ga kun yangs nas/  sum sa rgyab pa thag cu hrI
2b4(1): me tog pa ya na lta phur gyur te/ byig mchi'ams gdanas thug snga la chen po myong bar gyur ton// de dag thams cad kyang sems pan skye rlom pa dang / pad+ma ma kyi don gyi phyir thog pa chen po don dum ba'i stong pa nyid
2b5(1): rnal 'byorab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa dag bsnga nang ba'i phyir/ rnam pa sna chog mchom stond par rgyun gyi rkang pa'i phying / thams can thams cad
2b6(1): yongs su 'atul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gam pa der srur na/ dong nas/ spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor ngam tsu thal mo sbyar te phyog pa gcig du
2b7(1): de'i tshe gzham ya hU~M k+Sh+ma hUM ba'i bu mo dge slong ma dpal bzangs dang dge slong ma bsnyen dka' ma dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i zla grogs sogs te/ dge slong ma khrig 'phrag drug bcu snyed/ thams
2b8(1): cad kyang dag brgya / zag pa zad pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur da pa/ bya ba byas pa nyon mongag pa yongs su sangs pa dbang po rab tu dul ba/ klu chen po ltar gzi'i brjid rab tu che ba/ stong pa nyid
2b9(1): kyi shes rab dang ldan pa sha sta ga ste/ de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nyi ma thog mgar ba na// lus kyi 'a lha kun spyi bung zhes byed nas/ lus la khyab 'ang khrag kyis rgyas pa ni/ me tog pa la na wA 'ur g+ha rud t+te/ myig mchi ma
2b10(1): lo sra gang nas sdug rdul chen po myong bar gyur to// de dag kyang sems can thams cad gaphan pa dang / bde pa 'i phyir then pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor nga du sgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gnyis kyi las
3a1(1): nan pa 'gas so// 'dra bachen pacung brag brngus kyang kun nam sogs pa rtse/ 'di lta nor bu rin po ma skang man pa nid gyi snang ba dang / nong du na pa'i nyim rnyed pa'i snang ba dang / da bu na 'i mi zla ba rgya 'i gyi
3a2(1): dang / na dunanapachabs kyid du pa bla ba'i snang ba dang / nong burin po dpas kyi snying bldang ba dang / nang bu dab che dam nyid pa'i snang ba dang / ra du na pa'i spang pa'i rgyas tshad kyi snang pa nga / 
3a3(1): sgron ma chen mo'i snang ba dang / rin bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i sdang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi srin chen po dang / klog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i sdang ba dang / de dag pa sogs pa nong bu ring po rje
3a4(1): sdang ba chen po ci skye stong phrag bcus rtag tu sdang bar byas so// gan zhi / gi ma ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin mya stong phrag bcu'i cha 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldang ba ste/ dadus dang mthun pa'i can dan gyi ljin pargya skyong bran bcu'i
3a5(1): 'phrug rnas su byung ba/ mardzas pabams pa'i meng pa dang / dan na chen po kun tu dedangs sud//  sa sa chogs lda pa slong phrag bcu
3a6(1): babab pra/ swa rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi srin rgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pas/ lha'i bu rgya stong phrag bcu rtsa mthong ba dga' ste/ 'og tu lci zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lA mo'i srin rgya stong
3a7(1): phrag bsum sngon gyi khyod pa'i sbal ba mnyam pas rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i srin brgya stong phrag bcu nyan pa sgom zhing 'dod pa'i chad mngon par 'ab ba ste/ 'di ni dge bsnyen ma yin
3a8(1): bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i bcod pa na thogs m+b+ha / laka pa la khA rdzas 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / kadu gu thogs pa lag pa nor bu rin po/ 
3a9(1): che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyurd pa/ rna tsa rin po che thon ting dri ma byed pa rab tu 'bang ga/ mgo nar bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzer par brgyand pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna pa'i gong rgyan
3b1(1): thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'gul 'khor phogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba yog cing 'od 'bar ma/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de phyag bya zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma
3b2(1): yid bzhin ma de'i drung du/ shar phyogs nas 'tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs la nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i rig su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhal 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su rtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul
3b3(1): dga'a'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su rtogs pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam// dga' ldan gyi ris su rtogs pa 'am/ rab che ma 'am/ che ma'i ris su rtogs pa 'am/ gA'i dbang po 'am/ gsum bcu rtsa gcu
3b4(1): gyi ris su rtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nas// dri za'i dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am/ grum bum gi dbang po 'am/ grum bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ 
3b5(1): lha ma yin nam nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ nam 'kha ldi das/ myi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ myi 'am mi 'am/ lto phye chenang po 'am/ bzhin rje 'am/ gzhin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul
3b6(1): chen po 'ang/ yi dag gas/ rgyo'i nga pa'am/ byilang rung / ste/ sems ca dan byed gras byed pa/ dgadong ba dang de bzhin tu ma phyogs dang / nung phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
3b7(1): byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshangs dang / nub byang gi phyogs sarnams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang / tshangs pa chen po 'am
3b8(1): tshangs la nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su rtogs pa 'am/ dbang po byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su rtogs pa nas// nA myi'i dbang po 'am/ myi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab pa'aM/ 
3b9(1): kun mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khoran tam lta ba'i rnam pa snga tshogs la mngon par zhen tam// las kyi snyib zhig yod na yang de dag gis/ dge snyed ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu/ nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi par 'gyur/ 
3b10(1): sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ lta ba'i gsal zhing yang phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shig par 'gyur/ rnam dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sgribs pa myed pa khong du chud par 'byung te/ 
4a1(1): de'i dus ma kon mchog gsum yang nye bar bstand/ khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyi yang dag gang 'duld pa/ de dag rtog pa myed cing rtag par rab tu zhi/ khyod ni skye dga' na 'chim tha rad kyi nang sman
4a2(1): ma'i mchog/ yon tan sgyu mcho dpag tu phyed la mgos phyag 'tshal lo// sti skang dge ba'i byas pas kyi skyong de rab bzhin/ !/ tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrimam log la mtshungs par byams// mnyam pa nyid pa gnas
4a3(1): shi zugs kya na mtha bzhid/ sems can dkon mchog de la su zhig sa cad gyi byed/ thab badzin pa 'gro ba 'dum pa'i 'di dag de/ khyod kyi na bdu rabatu da pa'i yid kyis d+hA/ rapas dkyis kyi
4a4(1): pa rang gi mdun snang mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i Arjes sangs rgyas mtshan lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung cig rab tu byung ba yang // 'khor rnams kyis ni gsung la mthad gur rnam par rigs par gyis 'gro ba dag
4a5(1): gi rang gi don bzhin rnams rig pa// de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lags so// gsung cig rab tu bsgrags pa mdzad pa/ 'dre'i sa ni/ kha ci na gnas su bkod cing kha cig rtogs par gyis/ 
4a6(1): som nyid 'tshal la 'drend pa rab tu zhi mdzad de// de ni rgyal ba'i ba dres sadas rgyas mtshan lags so// stobs bcu bden pa'i sa nga snyamang 'gyod pabyug 'chis lo// 'jigs byed myi 'jig sa skyed pa
4a7(1): gyod la phyag 'tshas so// ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams nges par rtogs mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'drend pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu spyo gi bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// pa ro la byin te thang
4a8(1): bzhugs ya phyag 'tshal lo// 'dus pa'o 'gro ba bsgrol pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i 'gro ba mye gnas pa phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams dang 'gro ba'i chud ngu kun 'grogs kyang / 
4a9(1): 'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs/ pad mo dag ni chu skyes chu'i sa yod myi/ gos pa/ 1/ thub pa'i pad mos stong pa nyid ni shi nang tu bsgoms/ 4/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rab tu
4a10(1): rtsa lang / khyod ni ji la'ang smond par mdzad pa yod myi mchis/ sangs rgyas dag ni mthu 'a chen bsam gyis myi khyab ste// nam mkha' mtshungs par myi gnas de la bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan
4b1(1): 'das pa'i tshi zod du song cog byung gnas kyisacegs su panapadedag gis dod pa na bsod /  'anas la din kyi mags dunas na ma ngar gyi gso du rgya
4b2(1): tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ba'i byang chub kya yang dag par zhugs pa lags te// di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa ma cus kyi rlom thunan ci gang lhag sa shes/ sangs chub kyin
4b3(1): yongs su dag pa kun 'drid// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi gang yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bzhad tu ga sol/ den ce sa gso' ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b4(1): yitsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas la// legs so zhes bya ba byin te// legs so legs so// gzhon nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa lus pa brnams te// de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri ba
4b5(1): legs so// de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te/ ngas khyod la bshad do// legs so
4b6(1): bcom ldan 'das shes gsol nas// li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchoga'abyung gnas la sortogs pa// le tse byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
4b7(1): kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// rigs kyi bu sems can ni zhing ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam tu sems can la rgyas par byed pa de tsam du
4b8(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sems can rnams ji lta bur 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzind to// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams sa snga rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug par
4b9(1): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'dug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams blags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na
4b10(1): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nisems can gyi don las 'byung ngo // dkon mchog/ 'byung gnas de 'di lta ste// nam mkha' la ji lta bur 'jal 'dod pa de bzhin 'jal mod kyis// nam mkha' ni
5a1(1): nu na myings zhing / brgyad du yang myi rung bde bzhin du/ dkon macom 'byung gnas chos thams pa nirnam ma'a' dang 'dra bar shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can songs su sbyin pan
5a2(1): bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur gzhal bar 'dod pa de lta bud / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jam mod kyi// sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' ni gzhal du myi nus shing brgyan du myi rlung ngo // dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'on kyang / 
5a3(1): byams pa'i zhing ni byang du bye 'i sangs rgyas kyi shing stede byang chub tho ba ba'i sangs rgyas kyonang / sems can g.yo' skyed pa dang / spu skyed pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i khamam pa bzhin ni
5a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshogs la sems can bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs
5a5(1): rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye'o// byang chub sems sa dpa' sems bskyed pa rgya chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs
5a6(1): rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning deng then/  chen po yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// / sbyin pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rje/ 
5a7(1): de byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning bdog pa'i thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi zhing ni byang chun sems dpa'i sangs rgyam gyi zhing der// rnams pa gas cad dang 'am
5a8(1): zhing dge ba bcu'i lam kyi lam las kun bsrung ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems rapa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni ste/ de bya chub thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngedu mtshan
5a9(1): gsus masas kyi kyi 'od dang / bab zhingasu/ chog nyi pa'i mthas dasas bye ba thad do// sor 'bras kyi sdes bya ba ses ma gyi te// kyang
5b1(1): brgyad pa'i sems ca nas su 'acu'o// mam mkhas pa bya sems dpa'i mas rgyas kyi ye/  byang chub thob pa sangs nag dang /  sa dang myo pa'i mas nas
5b2(1): can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chus kyi phyogs gsus babarnyan ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ 'i byang chum pa'i pa'ims rgyas byin ne mun she bar zhan pad
5b3(1): yang dag pa yong ba dang / rdzu 'grus byed pa dang / dbang po dang / spobs dang /  chub kyi san pag dang / lam bsgrub pa shes pa'i sems can namam skye ba b+hU 'o// blo pa'i sems ni/ bya
5b4(1): da pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning du/  yon tan thams cad kyi mya nas se snang bar 'gyur ro// rgya 'om pa bcud rab du ni bar bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma sa rgyas kyi ni ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sa ma rnam
5b5(1): kyi zhing na/ dran mong thams cad shi nad tu bcad cing byi zhom pa ba rgyad myed par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid bslab pa'i tshig la gnas shing / pha rol kyi srung ba la myi rtsod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
5b6(1): ning ste na/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khrug pa'i sku yang myi grag par 'gyur ro//  dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa ni/  byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning ste/  de byang cu
5b7(1): thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshe gcig tu tshang ba dang yongs spyod che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgya nad pa dang / ngag 'jas pa dang / 'khor myi 'byed pa dang / 
6a1(1): bye ba snyam pa la mkhas pa dang / phrag dog dang bral ba dang / ngan sems byed pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / ldan pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub
6a2(1): sims pa'i spyod pa ni snyed par bsams pa yang de med do// bsas pa'i skyed par thug pa'i gam bag de med/ lhag pa'i bams pa'i snyed pa deb pang sems dpa' 'ad de stod / nges par sems dpa 'a ji rnye pa
6a3(1): nan tan yang de snyed do/ nan tan ji snyed par yongs su bsngo ba yang de snyed do// yongs su sngo ba ci snyed par thabs rnams kyang de snyed do// thabs rnams ji snyed par zhing yongs su dag pa de snyed do// mkha ji lta bur zhing yongs
6a4(1): su dag pa de ltar burasems can yongs su dag go// ji lta bur sems can yongs su dag pa'o// ji lta bur ye shes yongs su dag pa de lta bur bstan pa yongs su dag go// ji lta bur bstan pa'i yongs su dag pa de
6a5(1): lta bur ye shes bsgrub pa yongs su dag go// ji lta bur ye shes bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa de lta bur rang gi sems yongs su dag pa ste/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'dod
6a6(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as bdag gi sems yongs su spyad ba la nan ta bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ongadu
6a7(1): dag par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi nus tshe dang ldan pan ri'i bu 'di sum du sems te/ ji la bu sems yongs su dag pa 'dra bar byang chub sems da sa sa rgyas zhing yongs su dag pa gyur na/ bcom ldan 'as
6a8(1): ga kya grub pa byang chub sems pa'i spyan pa myong ba dadu/ sems mongs sus nadag parjin susangs rgyas kyi snying 'dig bung mongs su dag par ku dog mtho// denas mos 'du das byes ze nga ldan pa na 'i'i bu'i bes
6a9(1): kyi tog pa zhugs kyis sakhyen nas/ ma nga ldan pan ri'i bu la 'di ska ces bka' stsas to// / sha'i bu 'dis ma dusems nyis dang / zlab songs su dmams ce dmus pong dag gis su
6a10(1): thod gso sa dpa bcom ldan 'das dem pags so/ de ni dathus yong na zhes nong kyi/ nyis dang / rnabs ni ma lags so/ bka' yal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du ches
6b1(1): gshegs pa'i bangs rgyang kyi nga yongs su mi ma kyi/ shes sas pa sa pa ba gra dag mi shu pa 'dis sasmras so// bdud pa ni mas ca ca sa ni
6b2(1): shes ma ther cing bcud pa ga ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyin songs su mi kyi pa na brgyan pa gno bug du 'phrus dang byed kyi'i 'das bkod pa pa natuthob nas sa
6b3(1): kyanub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning bgong pa pa da kyis de 'dra bar mthong / dredres gnas gtan gari'i bus ngas par sad bcad pa 'di sa dpas smras so// tshangs gachog ni chen po 'di bsod pa dang / rtse sa dang
6b4(1): gsangs dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / gam grog dang / 'di da dan kyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo // tshangs ga mdapa can byis smras pa dgang bangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'dra ba thong ba ni btsu dag ri'i bu ze
6b5(1): la mthong man yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi se shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so// gang yang btsun pa ga ri'i bu sems can thams med pa sebs mnyam nying / sangs rgyas kyi le zhes la bsas pa
6b6(1): song su dag pa de dag gis ni sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'di rab tu yong sa dag par mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams la zhabs kyimathe bong brdabs nas ba dang / 
6b7(1): 'i 'jig rten gyi sa sod ta mi cimams ma 'od pa de ces 'dis rten gyi khabs 'di 'de 'a gyu ro// de sa 'o garabs na ngas ces byas ci/ bad tu na pa 'i bsta pa rgyam sa rnas/ 
6b8(1): byed do// denas bcog ldan 'das kyis che dang ldad nyin de'i bra la bka' laya na/ gzhi'i bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyinang gi 'od ta bgrod pa 'dis nong pa/ mtho' pas mthong // bcos pan 'das smon ma par
7a1(1): ma mthos pa'i 'di das gda'/ bka' sa 'das ga ri'i bu sangs rgyas rdzi zhing 'di ni shAtu 'di wa sems can pa ma rnams 'ong su sbyi pa du byung / 
7a2(1): ka gshesas pa'i sangs rgyab kyi zhing de lta bur nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags par bstan to// ga ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rnam sa rin po mo'i snod cig tu zas pa yang bzod dmas te ste phung bsags pa'i bar byang gyi
7a3(1): bcud kyi lha'i zas 'byung ba de bzhin du sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig tu skyes kyang / sems can gyi sems ji ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing yon tan bklod pa mthong ngo // de nas
7a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa 'di snang ba na srog chags brgyad kI bzhi sor bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas pa ldan cig tu lhags pa'i
7a5(1): bi tsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob par gyudad to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu phrul de brgyus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sngon gyi rang bzhin du rgyas
7a6(1): bar snang ngo // de nas nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi lha dang / myi rnams nga 'di snyam du sems te/ kye sa'o 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni myi rtag go snyam du rigs nas/ srog chags sum khri nyis srong rtul byed cing
7a7(1): dri ma dang bral te chos la chos kyi dbyig rnam par dag go// dge slong brgya song mang le nad pa byed cing zag pa las sems rnam par rloms sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po la mos pa brgyad tri ba ni stong rnams kyang chos thams cad
7a8(1): rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
7a9(1): yang de'i tshe na yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na li tsa byi dri ma byed par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba sa bye ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bstun du bu ny-i/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing / bzod pas
7a10(1): rab tu bded pa tho ba rab tu thob pang / mngom 'a shes pa chen pos rnam par ros ba ke gzungs rab thob tu byi 'jigs pa rab tu 'obo ba / bdud dang phyir ngados pa rnams bcom chos kyi mus zas
7a11(1): mo bzhinang tu thug sa ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa byung / 'bas mkhas kyi rtogs pa spobs pa dang ldanapa/ sems can sti sam pani/ spyod pa lamakhas pa/ sems sa
7b1(1): gyi dbang pos chog dang / la mashes pa pa 'byung ba/ ma ma mdzo gas par cos ston gyi theg padzin 'di sa pa byas da gdod kyim 'a bya ba dang / shin tu btugs te las byed pa pa sa rgya gyi byang
7b2(1): lnga gnas pa blo ngas pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkud te/ rab tu sngags pa/ rtsa byin dang / mtshangs pa da / 'jig rten skyong pa thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 
7b3(1): de sems can yongs su sbyin nga bar bya ba'i phyir/ thabs la mags pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po de na gnas te/ sems can mgon myed pa dang / dbul 'phongs pa yang dag par bya ba'i phyir/ longs spyod myi zad pa dang / sems
7b4(1): can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pasems can gtum pa dang / rab tu gdum pa dang ngan sems can dang / khro ba rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir
7b5(1): bzod pa dang dul ba thob pa/ sems can le lo can rnams yang dag parade bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grub 'bar ba/ sems 'khrugs pa'i semasayang can nams yang dag par slu ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / dran pa dang
7b6(1): ting nge 'dzin pa gdas pa/ sems can 'chas pa'i shes rab can rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab gdon gyi ma pa rab su thob pa nga te/ gos dgar babyon pa dge slong 'i myong lam phur gsum tshogs pa
7b7(1): byi mA gnas kyang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs byed pa'i khams dang / ma 'dres pa / bu dang / chung ma dang / sbas rnams ston kyang / rtag tu tshang me yang spyod pa/ g.yog blam
7b8(1): gyis bzod par snang yang rtag du dben par myong ba brgyand kyis brgyud par snang yang shAl tag tu sa chan dang ldan pa zas gos byims 'bar sdang yang dag tu bsas gta gyims rgyab thed mo dang brgyad pa'i
7b9(1): tham pa cad kyi gnas thams cad du snang ba yang ga brtsed mo dang / brgyand po che la chags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par byed cing rtag tub ga yod par spyod pas mtshan can thams cad rdzob yang / sangs rgyad/ 
7b10(1): ma myo du 'imams pa dang bladapa 'jig rnyed pa dang 'jig rten pas 'das pa'i sngags dang / gtsug lag gi nam pashes ba/ rtag tuchos kyi lta ba la dag ding mos pa da 'as pa kun tu spang 'ong / thams cad
8a1(1): ga pa chen pos sems ca rnamams da pa sasum byed/ chos nyad pa dang / ya dag par rdzogs ba mams cad pa snang / byis pa rnams songs su sbyin pa bya ba'i byeng / mtho'o na'am mas ca/ 
8a2(1): bkun bstadang pa'i phyir blang tshong mi mnas thams cad duyang gro/ drad pa la 'dra ngab par brnag pa'i phyiraca chong ma'i phyim thams cad tul gyug rlos kyi mchog snya dad pa'i phyir/ nong pon byidangadal ma borang da phran kyim // 
8a3(1): rig pa 'dzid pa thams cad kyi legs pa yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ khyim bdag gi nang du yang / khyim bdag sukun gyis yi/ bzod pa dang /  rab tu dga' ba dang / stobs pa rab tu 'bod pa'i phyid/ rnas
8a4(1): shAkyi nang du yang rgyab rigs su kun gyis rig ba rgyal dang / brgyags ba dang / dregs pa shin tu gzhos pa'i phyir bram ze'i nang du yang bras ba kun gyis rig/ rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad chos thams cad sgo ba'i phyir/ 6
8a5(1): blor po'i nang du yang blon por kun gyis rig rgyal po'i longs spyod dang / phyug pa la chags pa zlog pa'i phyir gzhon dur kun gyis rig bud myed gzhon nu yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ btsun mo'i nang du yang nyung chub tu kun
8a6(1): kyis rig tha sa lang pa'i bsod nams khyad par du dmyigs pa'i phyir/ ma rabs rnams dang yang mthun par 'jug bdag po myi rtag par bstan pa'i phyir/ rgya byin gyi nang du yang mya byin kun gyis rig/ ye shes kyi khyad par bstan pa'i
8a7(1): phyir/ tshangs pa'i nang tu yang tshangs par kun gyis rig/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyir par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang tu yang 'jig rten skyong bar kun kyis rig ste/ de ltar yi rba byi dris byed par grags pa tshad byed pa 'i
8a8(1): b+hab+hAs la 'khas pa se shes dang ldan pa/ 'angs pa'i grong khyer cher po na gnas shing 'dug go/ de thams can la mkhas pas bdag nyid na bu lta bur bstan dang/ de 'du 'dre ba'i phyir yangs pa'i drong khyer chen po nas rgyal po dang / 
8b1(1): nod des mkhas pas de gas pa rgya bya'o// logs so gsupa dini 'ayul ba dod pas su / lam gyi mdzod pa zu ny-i'i phyi chu bang ma te/ ridi byi dag pa'o// thas din gyi rgyas na
8b2(1): pa sbed pa pas bya mo// sa pa'i sus byes kyis sos dpani rkyen 'o/  'di 'bral 'thos e/ sapa/ brtsal pa zhes / so su
8b3(1): tsalta bu'o// sus 'di ni snyen ste/ sems 'khrul cing 'gyes nga ba'i mthamama'o/  gsus 'di ni glog dngas chungs te skad cig tu 'dzin pa dang ldan zhing byi gdas pa'o/ sum 'did bdag po byed pa rtse byed pa dadag
8b4(1): pas byung ba'o// lus 'di ni byed pa myed pa / sa dang 'dra'o// lus 'di ni bdag myed pa ste/ mu dang 'dra'o// lus 'di ni srog myed pa ste/ bye dang 'du'o// lus 'di ni gang zag myed pa ste/ rlung dang 'dra'o// 
8b5(1): lus 'di ni rang bzhin myed pa ste/ nam mkha' dang 'dra'o// lus 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi gnas so// lus 'di ni stong pa ste/ bdag dang bdag myed pa'o// lus 'di ni
8b6(1): yem bya ste/ ma rang shing dang / sdig pa dang bod pa dang / dmyig yod lta bu'o// lus 'di ni tshor bskyed pa ste/ rlung ni laphru lade 'khor dang ldan pas 'byung ngo // lus 'di ni gsog pa ste/ nag dang kyi mang pas gang ba'o// 
9a1(1): gsus 'din mo pa ste rtag tu 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'byes pa dang 'jos pa 'chos rgan no/  sras 'ang dri nang pazhi patu tha bzhis gces pa/ sum 'dzin nyodang pa nyid pa dang dra bye
9a2(1): tag tu dka' bas kyi srid kyis dod pa'o/ sus 'dzin gyi gnas pa ste nyi ga'i mamang thug pa'o// yus 'di ni gshengs dang dug drag po dang / grong skyong ba lta buste/ byung po dang / kham
9a3(1): dang skye mched kyis yongs su bind pa'o// khyod kyis de lta bu'i lus de la su nad pa dang skyo ba skyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mos pa skyed par bya ste/ grogs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
9a4(1): sku ste/ bsod nams skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdza sbyin pa las skyes pa/ tshul khrims las skyes pa ting nge 'dzi nad las skyes pa shes rab las skyes pa rnam par grol
9a5(1): pa las skyes pa rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las skyes pa/ dge'o/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms las skyes pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang
9a6(1): sdom pa las skyes pa'o// dgel ba bcu'i las kyi lam las skyes pa/ bzod pa dang / dre ba las skyes pa/ brtsona'agrus brtan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa/ bsam btan
9a7(1): dang / rnam par ma tha dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa las skyes pa/ thos pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs las skyes pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gsum bcu rtsa bdun las skyes pa/ 
9a8(1): zhing gnas dang lhag mthong las skyes pa/ stobs bcu las skyes pa/ myi 'jigs pa las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad las skyes pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad las skyes pa
9a9(1): mngon par shes pa dang / rigs pa las skyes pa/ myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spyod pa las skyes pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bskud pa las skyes pa'o// bden pa las skyes pa
9a10(1): dag pa nyid las skyes pa/ bag yod pa las skyes po/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dge ba'i chos tshad myed pa las skyes pa skye/ khyed kI saM de lta bu'i sku de la mos pa skyes par bya'o// 
9b1(1): bems pan thasas pade bya byang mdzes pa babs pad nga cwaskod mang pos rgyu na byed pa yang dag pa 'jogs pa'i byang chub tu sesami 'byed pa 'i drin ma dang
9b2(1): rabs mkhas pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i le'u shes bya ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yi tsa byi drim byed par grags pa 'di snyam du sebras pa// bdag ni na zhing kyi bdel ba ste/ khri'i se
9b3(1): na 'dug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la ma dgongs te/ thugs rtse ba'i phyir nad 'dri ba 'ga' yang me btang ngo // snyam tu sems so// de nas bcom
9b4(1): ldan 'das kyis yitsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa de lta bur sems kyis tog pa mkhyend nasabacom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' sa \u0f7fla dpa sha ri'i bu khyod yis byi dri ma myed par grags pa'i nang dri bar
9b5(1): so shig dang / de skad ces bka' sa \u0f7fsad pa dang / bcom ldan 'dasad la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces bso yad to// bcom ldan 'das bdag lid tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa'i bro 'dri zhing/ mchil
9b6(1): bar gyi gro'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par ma tshal la tu cig gi tshe/ shing cig gi drung dang / nang du yang dag par 'jogal zhugs lags te/ li tsa byi dre ma myed par grags pa yang shing cig gi
9b7(1): rlung ga la ba re mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod ji ltar nang du yang dag 'jog pa la/ nang tu yang dag 'jog par gyi bya'o// ji ltar khams sum du rang gi lus dang / sems kyi sngang
9b8(1): bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag bzhag par gyis shig/ ji ltar klog pa las kyang myi langs shing 'khyod las kun tu yang sdang bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag bzhag par gyis shig/ ji ltar rob pa'i mtshad nyid kyang myi 'dod la/ 
9b9(1): pho mo'i skye bo'i mtshan nyid du yang snang ba de ltar nang su yang dag bzhig par gyis shig/ ji ltar khyod kyi sems nang de yang gyi 'jug la/ phyi robod kyi gzugs la yang rnam par myi 'apyod pa de ltar nang du yang dag bzhag par gyis shig
9b10(1): ji nyung lnga bar gyur pa rnams cad kyang gyi gso ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bus bcus bdun rnams pa yang snang sadu/ de ltar dang dusang dag parnag par gyis zhig/ de ltar 'khor ba du spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams phyis gyi 'ongs
10a1(1): das 'as pa maka la ba sams bsamasas ma nyid de thos smra/ spa pa na bams byis ci ba ca to/ rtse spru la 'dzumardzogs
10a2(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me'u 'gal gi bu chen po la bka' sa san pa khye'u 'gas kyi bu khyod lin byi dri ma byed par grags pa'i nad 'dri nu song shig pa/ bye 'u 'gal kyi bus kyang gso ldad pa / bcom ldan 'das byem bu phras
10a3(1): pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar myi spro'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par 'tshal ba'i dus cig na/ yangs pa'i grong phyir chen po 'i drang srong cig gi sgo na chos bstond pa de li tsi byi dri ma myed par grags pa de
10a4(1): bachis nas bdag la 'di skad sa gsos/ btsun pa bye'u 'gas kyi dzus mam stod pa su na kyis bdag gos dgang po can rnams pa bud nam gyi sodang to// brgyad pa rtse tha lags kyi ma 'angs pa bzhin pa
10a5(1): chos bskod par bya ste/ btsun pa bye'u 'gal gyi gachom ni/ spos can byed pa ste/ sems can gyi rgyas dang bral ba/ bdan byed pa ste/ 'dod chags kyi rnas dang bral la bros byed pa rtse
10a6(1): skye ba dang mchi 'pho ba dang bral ba/ gang zag byed pa se/ thog ma'i mtha' dang sab ma'i mtha'i yongs su chad pa/ zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / mtshan nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba dbyigs pa 'gro ba
10a7(1): yi ge byed pa/ tshig thams cad brjod du byed pa/ rlabs thams cad dang bral ba thams cad kyi rjes su gsod pa ste/ nam mkha' dang / kha rodog dang // mtshan ma dang dbyibs byed pa/ rtsu ba thams cad dang bral ba/ 
10a8(1): ra ba myed pa/ ra'ir 'dzind pa myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa ste/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ gnyen po myed pa'i phyir/ 'dra ba myed pa'i rgyu dang myi mthun zhing / rkyen dadang sgro 'dogs pa myed/ 
10a9(1): ba/ chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni nyam par bzhag pa/ rjes su myi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rab tu myi gsol ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
10a10(1): gnas pa/ yus drugs kyi rten 'bas kyi g.yo ba/ byi gnas pas// gang du med 'gro ba dang 'od ba skyed pa/ spyod pa nyid la mnyam par bzhags te/ mtshan ma myed pas rab tu bye ba/ smond pa skyed pa'i mthun
10b1(1): skye mgol gyi dpa' zhing gnas pa/ gyi gsong bar gyud pa rab tu rtsu ba sems cad dang bral ba ste/ btsun pa me'u 'gas kyi bu chen po de la bu'i chos kyi mnad pakyi 'bargyan pa rtsen 'gas kyi bu chen po chom sa dang zhe sa kyas
10b2(1): de'ang spro btags pa'i tshig ste/ gang mnyan de 'ang sgro btags pas nyand to// de ltar btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu gang la sgro btags pa'i tshig myed pa de la/ chos ston pa myed pa/ mthong ba yang myed pa/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i
10b3(1): skyes bu ya/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus chos bstonang pa bzhin no// de lta bur sems gnas pas chos bstan par bya'o// khyod kyis sems can gyi dbang po la mkhas par bya'o// yang dag par mthong ba'i shes par snang ba dang / 
10b4(1): snying rje chen po la mngon par gyur da pa dang / theg pa chen po la shi nad tu sngagadas pa dang / sangs rgyas la byas pa bzo ba dang / bsam pa dag pa dang / chos la nges pa'i tshig gis rnam par shes pa dkon mchog gi rigs
10b5(1): byichad par bya ba'i phyir/ khyed kyis chos bstan par bya'o// bcom 'das de lta de lta bur des chos bstan pas/ gang khyim bdag ni/  'khor khyim bdag brgyad rgya po de dag blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs ma
10b6(1): byang chub tu sems skyes so// de drug kyang spobs pa mchis par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi ring gyi spro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la
10b7(1): bka' brtsa la pa/ 'od srung chen po khyod na byi drim myed par grags pa nad 'dri bar song shig/ 'od srung chen pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar gyi sna'o// bdag gis mngon par
10b8(1): 'chal ba'i dus cig na/ dbul po'i khyim thams cad du 'gro ba ni byams pa phyogs cig pa yin te/ btsud pa 'od srung chen po chos mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par bya'o// dus thams cad duthams cad la bsams te bamod snyoms/ 
10b9(1): btsal bar bya'o// zas byed pa sa zas bcal bar bya'o//  gzhan ring pod 'dzind pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms la spyad pa bya'o/ grong spong bar byind kyis rlabs te/ srong bu 'jug par bya'o// skyes pa dang / 
11a1(1): bud myed yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang ldan par khyod kyis khyim du 'gro bar bya'o// myi lend pas bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o// dbus song dang
11a2(1): 'dungs pas gazlanas rnams la lta'o// khrag sa dang 'dra bar ska rnams sand par bya'o// yang dug gi dngos po dang / bzhin gyi ngos po de ni myi 'du bya'o// gang byed pa de ni'i gar myi 'gyur ro'o// gal te gnas btan 'od srung
11a3(1): chen mnas baspyod pas kyang kyi 'ogs zhing/ rnam par mtho pa brgyad pa sgoms par 'dun phyo sog pa'i mnyam ma nyid kyis yang dag par mnyes pa nyid pa 'jug pa dang / babod snyoms cig gis kyang / mimamathon thoms
11a4(1): cang sa byed par byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa thams cad la sang bul ras ka/ 'dod du bdag gis bza' bar bya'o/ 'di ltar nyon mongan pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ nyod mongs pa dang bral ba yang pa yin par
11a5(1): de ltar b.ra'o// mnyam par yang ma bzhag pa/ langs pa yang dam yin pa de ltung baba'o// 'khor pa la myi gnas la mya ngan pa garas pa yang myi gnas pa de ldan papa'o// bcun papyod pa mod songs
11a6(1): bang byinan pa de gang de dgas smra ma par ma yin la chung bar dubamyi 'gyur / brib sa du ma yin/ byud bar tu 'grob sa pas na/ sangab rgyas gshegs pa'i 'jug par bya'o// nyan pos/ 
11a7(1): ba byas bu la tu bya byanas gtan 'ad su zer lta byung gi sa sod som pa 'o/ los 'dums sa pa rlon bye / ma
11a8(1): bamam dpa' bams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim na 'das kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang 'dran su nig than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyi sbyor/ dedud ma tho ga zhes sems can tsam
11a9(1): da reg pa chen po sa lags pam nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /  rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la stom chad ma bcu dngo bcom ldan 'das de ltabs na/ bdag zhes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri ning mchi bar rgya na 'o// 
11a10(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la bka' ma khar pa / rab 'byor nga khyod yi ca bye ste myed par grags pa'i nang 'bri bar mo cig / rab 'byor du kyis kyu gsol dab /  bcom ldan 'das padage
11b1(1): skyes bu ram pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchil bar myi spro'o// de ci'i skud du zhe na// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par mtshal ma'i dus cig na/ sangs pa'i grong khyer chen po lid byi drim byed par grags pa'i khyim du bsod/ 
11b2(1): snyoms la mchis na/ li tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pas bdag gi lhung bzed 'tshal nas/ Sha zas bzang pos bkang ste/ 'di skad ces mchi'o// gal te btsun pa rab 'byor da khyod zang zhing gi mnyam pa nyid kyis
11b3(1): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rtogs na gdod bsod snyoms 'di long shig/ de sde btsun pa rab 'byor chags pa dang
11b4(1): zhe sdang dang / gti mug ma spangs pa de la/ de dag dang lhan cig tu myi gnas/ de sde 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang myi pyod la/ bgrod pa cig po la lam du yang song / phyed kyi sa ri b+ha dang / 'khor ba'i sred pa yang ma bcom
11b5(1): rig pa dang / rnam yar mthar pa yang ma skyed/ mtshams myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grog pa yang ma mtshungs/ grol ba yang ma yin pa/ bcings pa yang ma yin// khyod kyis 'basas
11b6(1): pa'i bdes pa pa ni yang ma mthong sa/ bden pa mthong po yangs sde / 'bras bu yangam non/ ma mo'i skye ba'i cho sa las kyang ma sod// 'phags pa'i snam ma yin / ma 'phags pa yang ma yin/ 
11b7(1): chos thams ca dang ldadapa / chom thams cad kyi du zhes bral ba rkye rgyas son par 'dzong / chos kyang 'phos den bdun pasang bsnyen pakur ma byas shing / gang blong pa zupa
11b8(1): de dag la 'di gA ze re/ 'o srung rdzogs byed dang / byug pa zhes kyi bu ska dang / po'i mati'i bu kun rgyal dang / t+ya'i bu nog can dang / byi 'jam sna'i la bcad dang / cer bu pa gnyen gyi bu de dag brdung pa
11b9(1): bzon pa yind te/ de la babyed dusmra/ myong rab tu byung zhing / sor da pa drug po re dag gar 'gro bdu/ 'phanam sa rab 'byor sang 'grol ka bang byun pa thams cad kyi dang dusang rtogs zhing
11b10(1): mtha' dang dbus kyang gyi ched/ phyi'om brgyad kyi phyir pa 'dug cing / dad bathos gapa byed/ kun nam nyon mongs daras pa mnyam par byu pa/ rnam par byang pa 'i'i bzung // gang sems can thams can byan/ 
11b11(1): tshang pa pa byed pa de/ bdu pa'i ma nyon mo ma la byed pa nyid/ byang bya bye ma ma das ba shus na brjod sum g.yod goms sbyin pa dedag bya pa la bung bar byab/ khyod chu dam par das
12a1(1): cin nyid mongs pa thams cad kyang khyong kyi rdzogs su gyu nga pa nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid ci 'dro ba btsun pa byed kyar mo nyid kyang de dang rwa/ sems can thams cad la yang spyang kyis gsos pa'i 'asems nye bar
12a2(1): sayang rgyas thams da sa khyod kyis 'gas/ yangs rgyas gyi chos thams cad pasang kyi mang par byam/  lung kyi byar da kyi 'dzin / ra pa yongs su myo na pam kyi 'ad da kyang bya
12a3(1): kyi/ sa kyi chung bar su kyi ngas byed pa drugs pa dadas pa din mas 'o// bam 'a ca 'byod ni papa di ba shes pa sun pasas bya
12a4(1): togs par yi ge de dag yi ge ma yin te/ chos thams cad ni rnam bar grol ba'i mtshan nyid do// rab tu bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// sA'i bu gnyis brgya rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral te/ chos la chos kyi
12a5(1): byig rnam par dag go// lnga'i bu lA brgya ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// bdag kyang spobs pa ma mchis par byung nas/ de la srang la nam nus te ra bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes
12a6(1): bu dag pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar gyi spro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bu la bka' la lad pa/ gang po khyod li rtsa byi dri ma byed par dgrags pa'i nad 'dri bar song shig/ gang pos
12a7(1): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar myi smi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshalu b+ha'i dus cig na/ sa'i phyogs gzhan dus las
12b1(1): dang po kha'i dge slong dag la chos pa ston pa der/ yi tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// btsun pa gang po snyoms par bzhugs te/ dge slong 'di dag ni sems la snyom la chos
12b2(1): pa gang po sems cad thams cad kyi dbang po mngon gsum du ma gyur da la nyi cha'i dbang po nye bar gyi sgrub po/ ma myed pa la rmas 'gyur cig/ lam chen por 'jug par 'dog mong ma bzung shig/ rgya mtshol chen mo
12b3(1): thugs kyi rtsig rjes su ma thugs shig/ nyi ma'i 'di srid bus/ rgyur 'od du ma spyad da cig/ seng ge'i rtswa la yang dag pa dazhugs dpa rnams pa'i rnas pa gzhung cig de ltang bcu ga mang po'i ge nong
12b4(1): 'di dag thams cad ni theg sa chen po sa yang dag par zhugs pa// / byang chub kyi sems sa stong bdun sbyin te/  mun pag po 'didag sa nyan thos kyi nagapas san a+wa/ tan rdzas kyi ses pa'i
12b5(1): yang ba yin te/ sems can gyi dbang po 'i ris pashes pas nyi pos 'di dag kya bdag gis dbus long dang mtshungs par mthong de nas su byi dri ba byed par grags pa de'i tshe ji ltang dge 'a slong de dag sngon gdas
12b6(1): pa rnam pa mang po rjes su drad par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de dag blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi byi sangs rgyas lnga brgyas snyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
12b7(1): chus kyis pa shes mngon kya / dedas de ga smos thu sa pa'i dang pa la gagos kyi na/  yang nan byed pa ma dag pa shes pa'i bya ba pas kyi gyi
12b8(1): bar gyur na ba de lta bur chos bstan danas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag zhes 'di snyam bsams so/ nyan thos kyi pha rol kyi sems dang / bsam pa ma mas par tshul yang chos gyi bstan to// de ci'i lung
12b9(1): nyanams kyi sems can thams cad dbang po gnog dang chog pa yin pa shes pas thamasas nan / des bzhin bzhenas pa rdza ma pasang dag par rdzogs ma'i nas rgyag bzhinan/ 
13a1(1): mnyam par bzhag pa yang ma lags so zhem mo/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de 'gro 'dra zhing mchi bar gyi s+ho/ de nas bcos lan las kyis tshe dang ldan pa sargya bu che po
13a2(1): dga'as lad tha kat+ya bu ched pa byad pas byi ma byed par mags pa'i rnyed dri bar mo shig/ bye bu chen pos kyang gsong ba bcos pan 'das bdag skyes bu das pa 'dra'i kyil gyi sto/ 
13a3(1): kye'i rmang du zhen bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon pa mtshal pa'i rgyas cig na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bge 'thong rnams la bdasas pa/ mdod bka' la to// mdo de'o ga nas pa non pa rtse
13a4(1): ma yang bar bgyi ba'i mdadu / bgani com yadas se yenyes pa'a'ad la du/ byed pa dod dang/ sa te/  kyin byed pa thag pa de
13a5(1): di ces mchodabatsun pa ga bye su rgyu pa dang brnam pa/ skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / ldan pa'i chom ma bsnun cig na btsun pa ka tu'i bu ga gzhin dus skyes kyi byed kyikyi byi gos
13a6(1): 'gal par myi 'gyur ba de ni myi rtag pa'i don to// gang phu lo lnga rnams pa spong pa nyid du rtogs pas skye ba skyed pa'i de ni stong pa'i don to// gag bdag byed par gnyis myi bye ba de de bdag byed pa'i'adod pa/ 
13a7(1): pa gamapa nyid dang /  bya sa ca kyi gsab ma kyi lan kyi kyi ba shi gyungal
13a8(1): zhi pa'i don to// yang rab tu ba gad pa'i 'di san pa'i tshe/ dge slong nge gag lend pa myed par zag pa las sems nam par grol lo// debs na bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skyes bu dam dan 'bro sbyin pas bar bya smo
13a9(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la bka' saHla dab/ ma 'gags pa khyod li tsa byi 'i ma myed par grags pa'i nad 'dri bar song shig/ ma 'gags pas kyang gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes
13a10(1): zhu ba pa de'i blo 'dri zhing maming bar gyi spro'o / de ci'i slad ba zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par sa tsam pa'i dus cig na/ bdag bcag sa zhig na 'jug sa dang tshang ba pa chen po dge ba bkod pa zhes bgyig/ 
13b1(1): tshangs pa kI dang ldan cig tu/ phyogs der snang bar byas nas/ bdag ga la ba der mchi sti/ bdag gi dam pa la mgos pos phyag babyis nas/ phyo gas gyin rdzu 'arjod do nang na//  dun la 'di skad ces mchid/ btsun pa sa
13b2(1): tshis ci bring chun chad mthong ba bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so grogs po dag kho bos ni bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di lta ste
13b3(1): dper na skyes bu dmyig dang ldan pa'i lag thil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhin mthong ngo // btam 'di bgyis pa dang / li Na byi dri ma myed par grags pa phyogs der mchis te/ bdag gi rkang pa la mgo' bos byag
13b4(1): bgyis nas/  bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/ btsun pa yang ma 'gags pa 'phrul gyi dmyig mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyidang dam 'on te mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam
13b5(1): de gal te mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin rje/ phyi rol kyi lnga mngon par shes pa dang mtshungs so// de ste mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin na ni/ mngon par myi byed pa ni 'dus
13b6(1): rgyam thos na reb ni 'ayong bar byin pa gas rgyas de ltar yod/ rnye pa padag cang kyi mi 'a gyu te/ sa pa ridag kyis kya skyes bu dab pa degs ra tu gam pa mthob
13b7(1): sa na kyi kyi nga /  ga rgyam mos las pa 'i kyi thig mnyam pa na
13b8(1): tharlos phyin chung su bya ma rnyed padas pa skyes sum khye thus kyis tsho// thas pa grus gas nyid kyi snang bar bya ste/  khya po sas su pa
14a1(1): de bas na bdag skyes bungs pa dang zla 'dri zhing mnis par byim na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldang bslu ba li la bka' sa'adang/ yun ma nyu ma byo pa byed par grags pa'i sa
14a2(1): ba mngan/ yab sa bya ma mthong pa/  'du ras byes gradam 'badrang drani ma med pa kyi'o/  pa med/  dus lasu sa yod pa pa sa ma
14a3(1): gnyis zhig srung bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la ro mas tebacom ldan 'das kyi drud namachil nas/ de gnyis bdag gal ba de mchis te/ bdag pa 'digad ces ma'o// brgyad bsus mdag cin
14a4(1): gnyis la lhung bzung ste/  tshwa gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung tu ya ma mchis na/ che dang ldan pa rtsu ba 'i khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis kyi sa chos gsol to// bdag bcag sung ba la mo myong shin/ bcos smad la
14a5(1): badz+ra ga dge' slong de gnyis la chos kyi gtam 'dond pa'i phyogs der li tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa yang phyogs der phyinang nas de bdag la na 'di skad ces mchir// bcun bsdu ba li khyod kyis dge slong
14a6(1): 'di gnyis kyi srung ba snar lci bar ma bya rtog pa can du ma bya bar/ 'di gnyis kyi ltung ba gsos shig/ brdzun ba.u ba li ltung ba'i napa na yang myi gnas/ phyi rol tu sang dbyi pos
14a7(1): gcig byed pa yang bye dbyigs so// ci phyir nin /  bcom sben 'das kyis bka' la dpa// sems nyon mongs pas sems can narnam sa'o// sems rnam par mus pasasems canam na
14a8(1): par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs te/ btsun pa slu ba li sems ni nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol dan yang ma yin/ gnyi ga myed par yang myi dmyigs so// sems ci lta bar ltung ba yang de bzhin no/ 
14a9(1): sUr la ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ yang dag pa nyid las myi 'da'o// btsun pa u ga li 'gag sems kyi rang bzhin dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin dag gis btsun pa'i sems rnam par grol ba
14a10(1): sems kyi rang bzhin de rnams kyang ston spongs pas/ smras pa de yang ma yin no// smras pa btsun pa mu pa li sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang de'i rang bzhin no// btsun pA s+yA p+ta kI kun tu rtog pa ni nyon mongs pa'o// 
14b1(1): mye rtog pa rnas par bya rtag pa rang bzhin no// byin gyi mag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa myi gnas phyiganas ste/  byin gyim log pa'i dang can nan daM ni na ma sa gyon mongs pa'o// bdag byed
14b2(1): nirang bzhin no/ brdzun bsu pa yi chos thams cad ni skyes nas 'jig cing kyi gnas pa / sbrum dang / sprin dang / thog lnga bu'o// chos thams cad ni byed rje'i ng+ge da cig cab su lang gyi 'du go// 
14b3(1): chos thams cad rmyi lam dang 'dra'o/ kyis smra ba dang 'dra'o ste/ yang dag pa ma yin mthong ba'o// chos thams cad nu'i bcwa ba dang 'dun/ gzugs brtan dang 'dra 'dra ce na bems kun da rtog pa las
14b4(1): 'byung ngo // gag gis de lta bu shes pa de ni 'dul ba 'dzind pa zhes bya ste/ gag 'di lta bur 'dul ba ni/ de dag shin du btul ba'o// de nas dge slong de gnyis 'di skad nas mchi/ khyim bdag 'din
14b5(1): shing tu shes pa dang ldan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i 'dzin pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa/ btsun bsla ba li 'di ni de lta bu ma yin no// de dag pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// dge slong
14b6(1): khyod kyis 'di la khyis bdag stan+tan+ta cu shes pa skyed cig/ de ci'i phyi / de bzhin da shegs pa mtshon pa thang / nyan thomasas// byang chub sems dpa' na 'a grobs pa gcod pa nus pa
14b7(1): ra byed de/ 'di'i shes rab kyi snang ba ni de 'dra'o// de nas dege slong de gnyis the tsam pas yang nas/ de nyid tu lhag pa'i bsam pas than myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 
14b8(1): de gnyis kyis skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems can thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i spobs pa thob par gyud cig/ ces mchod// de bas ma bdag skyes bu ras pa de'i bro 'dri zhing maming bar bye/ 
14b9(1): spro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nod sbyin 'dzin la bka' saHlang nas/ nod sbyin 'dzin khyod li tsa byo dri ma myed par grags pa'i nad 'dri bar sor shig/ nor sbyin 'dzind kyis kyang gsol pa/ 
14b10(1): bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de bro 'dri 'ingam chi bar myi spro'o// de ci'i slang khyenanabadag gis mngon par mchal pa'i dus cigan/ min gyi gon sub bzhig bdag ga ya ba der mchis te/ bdag la
15a1(1): 'di skad ces mchi'o// / bcud pa nod sbyin 'dzin khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi bras yin te/ 'thod pos sbyar ba'i rgyal mo'i srid por ste/ rab tu byung da rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang / legs pa dang
15a2(1): lags zhes mchi 'das de dag la 'dzin par rigs rab tu 'byung ba'i yon tad dang legs pa bsnyen cing mchi 'du/ li tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa yang bdag gas ga 'diras chis nas des bdag la phyag bgyis te/ 'di skad ces/ 
15a3(1): bsor bcud pa nor srin 'dzin rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang / legs pa brjod cing ci ltar khyod stonod pa de ltar gyi stond to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab tu byung ba'i yon ten dang / legs pa byed pa yin te/ brtad pa nod
15a4(1): sbyin 'dzin gang la 'dus byas 'jig pa de la yon tan dang legs pa yod kyi rab tu 'byung ba ni 'dus byas pa la ni yon tan dang legs pa myed do/ btsun pa nor sbyin 'dzinang rab tu byung ba ni gzugs myed pa ste
15a5(1): gzugs dang bral ba'i thog ma dang mtha' ma'i sathar lta bdang / bral ba'i/ stobs lnga rab tu thob pa'o// dbang po lnga ni rten to// gzhan la myi gnod pa'o// sdig pa'i chos 'dris pa 'o
15a6(1): bru stegs can gzhan rab tu btul kha'o// 'das pa las shi na tu 'das pa'o// !/ 'dod pa'i 'dam la zam pa'o// yongs su 'dzin pa skyed de/ ngar 'dzinang pa myed cing / ngar 'dzind pa dang bral ba'o// 
15a7(1): thedrang pa byed pa/ 'bru'ad pa byed pa/ 'brug pa spongs pa'o// rang gi sems 'phrul zhing / gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'o// gni gnas dang bdun pa'o// mams cad du lanam mtho bskyed pa rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ 
15a8(1): gang de lta phu rab sa byung bar dag de gin klurab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// gnon du khyod kyang legs par gsungs pa chos 'dul ga khye sa zung shig/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba sang rnyed par dga'o// dpapa 'byod pa sa rnyed pa da da / 
15a9(1): phyir byu dad pa yang rnyed par da ka'o// gzho nu de dag gis 'dind ces smras mo// khyim bdag bdag bcag gis zlos na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ pa mas ma gnas pa rgyab tu byung myi 'byin ce'o// des bdag
15a10(1): sa zhen myong cis par bye pa pa stsogasas gra sa cishes sa /  gyi sngo du/ ro nyi ces san sgo / ga sa kyi sa duthamam
15b1(1): gnyis brgya rnams bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed dedo/ dai bas na bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu ngas pa de'i bro 'dra zhing me chi bo'i gyi rje gyur/  nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa
15b2(1): dga' bo la bka' baN+Dal dpa/ dga' bo khyod len byi dre ma skyed par grags pa'i nang 'dri bar song shig/ dga' bos byed gsol dab/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i blo 'dri zhing mchi bar gyi dz+ha'o/ de ci'i drung / 
15b3(1): khu zhe na bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par mtshal pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skul myi mde' ba zhig byung nas/ de la 'o me zhig mamalang te/ bdag bras ze dras chen po zhig ge sgo rlung na srung med thogs
15b4(1): gang mchis pa dang / yis kyi drim byed par grags pa deng mchis nas bdag la phyag bgyis nas/ 'di sad ces mchi / btsun pa dga' bo rje'i phyir nang par lnga srung ze thogs nas khyim gyi sgo drung 'jug de labang / 
15b5(1): is 'di skad ces bgyis so/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la myi bde la zhig byung ste/ de la 'o ma zhig dgos nas de tshol lo zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad ces mcho/ btsun pa dgan
15b6(1): po 'di skad ces ma zer cig/ btsun pa dga'o bo de bzhin gshe/ gas pa'i sku ni rdo rje ltar sra ste/ dmyi dge ba thams cad kyi bag chags/ ni spangs dgel ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan na/ de la myi bde la ba
15b7(1): galas byung / des nyam ngapag la yod/ mun pa dang / po bcom ldan 'das la ma skur dpar cang ma zer bar song shi nagazhan su la yang de skad ma hA cig/ gzi brjid cen
15b8(1): dkrung sa chub nga/ rtse du padang / mjo pa gan da nasas sa ga gas pas nyi na can ma dzu kye du / sems cas dag ni su lag 'azus lta tha sems kyi
16a1(1): rung ngo // btsun pa dga' bo gang la myur tu bzhud cig gzhan gyis thos sa re/ btsun pa dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin te/ khams kyis gsol ba'i lus ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
16a2(1): lag rten las 'das pa'i sku yin te/ 'jig rten pani chos thams cad las shin du tu 'das pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i su ni gnod pa sred pa de/ zag pa mas cad las na yang log pang/ de bzhin mazhenas pa'i rgyun
16a3(1): 'du ba babyam la te 'du byed thams cad dang bral zer// btsun pa dga' bo de lta bu la dang yod par 'dod pa ni phyi rigs shing 'dra ba ma yin no// bdag bcom ldan 'das lam bdagags mig par pom zhing / sog sa ga na/ 
16a4(1): par 'gyung snyam ste bdag rab tu ngom par gyur to// de nas bdag gis bar snar las snga zos pasta/ btsun pa khyim bdag gis rje skad du/ bshad pa bzhin yin mod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnyog pa lnga'i dus na byung / 
16a5(1): bab de sems can rnams ngan pa dang dbul po'i spyod padang / dayul te de yang byas na/ dga' bo ngotsha bams byed par 'o ma khyer la song shig / de bas na bcom ldan 'das les bye bro ba byed par grags pas/ 
16a6(1): dris pa dang / lu sond pa'i bye brag dri ste skye/ bcom ldan 'das thadag skyes bu dam de'i bro 'dri zhi nga mchil bar myi spro'o// de bzhin du nyan thom lnga brgya rnam myi spro bar gyur pa de dag gis/ 
16a7(1): rab rang gi spobs pa bcom ldan 'das la gso sod to// gang li tsa byi dres myed par grags pa dang gtam byas pa de thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la gos la ba to// / 'phags pa dri ma gyed pa grags pa/ 
16a8(1): bsta nang ba// / bam po thog ma'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pal bka' ba mang ba byams bskyod gi rba byi dris byed par grags pa'i nad 'dri
16a9(1): par mo shig/ byams pas kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar gyi spro'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par mchal pa'i dus cig na/ 
16a10(1): shinang tu dga' ldan 'das rgyal po las mchogs pa/ dka' ldan lha'i rigs kyi lho'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir gyi ldog pa'i sa las brtsams te/ chos kyi gtam
16b1(1): ba sa kyi sa bye ma na ma ga pa rnan sa kyi kyi sa kyi
16b2(1): stanas nasabyams pa de skye ba gag lung bstand/ byams pas ji 'das pas bsam/ de snyed snyer gyis sam/ de la gang 'das pa'i de ni zad pa'o// de snyan gyi skye ba la ni gnas pa sang byed de/ 'dis
16b3(1): ste bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas \u0f7fla pa/ 'di ltar dge slong dag khyod ni skad cig tu skye'o// rga'o// mchi/ 'pho ba 'byung po zhes gsungs so// da skye ba myed pa ni myi 'gyur bar 'jug pa ste/ myi skye ba ni lung/ 
16b4(1): bstand pa yang byed/ myi skye ba mngon par rdzogs par 'chang sang kye rgyan byams pa khyod de bzhin du skye bas sam/ de bzhin nyid la 'gags pas sam/ ji ltar lung bstand/ de bzhin de bzhin nyid ni myi skyer gyi 'gag/ 
16b5(1): 'gag par myi 'gyur te/ gang sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dza/ gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gang 'phags pa mos thams chud kyi de bzhin nyid de ni byams pa khyod yang de bzhin nyid de/ de ste re ltang
16b6(1): bung pyod de lung bstan ngan ni/ sems can thams cad kyang lung bstan payin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu/ bye bas yin/ ngapa dad pas ra glegs yin te/ 
16b7(1): byams pa khyod byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par chang skyab na/ sems cad mas cad kyang de'i dus na/ de'u bur byang chub tu mngon par rdzog pa sa'adrang bya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir nen pa sems can
16b8(1): thams cad rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub tu bya'o// nas byas la pa khyod yongs su myedan las 'das pa de ni/ thams can thams cad kyang yongs su gyung na mas 'dang bar 'gyur ro// dkyi byir zhed/ sems can rnams/ 
16b9(1): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las kyi 'do'o/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhi bsan/ de dag gis sems cad thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das mthong ngo/ 
16b10(1): de bas na byams pa zhi'i bu 'di rnams ma su ma srid cig/ byang chub sa ni su sar myi gnas kyi ldog na/ byams pa lta'i bu 'dirnams byang chub la kun dasu rtog par lta bu de 'dod du 'jug zhi byang chub pa ni lus kyis mdzan/ 
17a1(1): kha 'a sems kyis bya ma da/ byang chus nis ca sa gams can she byang sa kyigs cad bya btags pagyid so khya ma lan byed pa ma
17a2(1): rtsub byed pa'o// byang chub pa ni lta bar byu pa mams cad yongs su cad pa'o// byang chub la ni 'dzid pa thams cad dang bral zhing sa chags par 'dug pa'o// byang chub la ni ga yo ba dang / sems pa dang / stso
17a3(1): thams pa dang / bral ba'o// byang chub la de smon las thams cad las ma nyams pa'o// byang chub san rnas kyi byings kyis gnas pa'o// byang chub la ni bzhi nyid rjes su rtogs pa'o// byung dub pa/ 
17a4(1): ngag pa nyid bya ba bas gdas mos byang chub bani 'ad pa tshe sa byed papa gargyams byed pa'o// byang cub 'a rnas pa' 'dangs nyar po'i byeng byung chubs ni sanyam pas/  bdi byes
17a5(1): 'jig pa dang / granas pa dang / gzhang du byung pa byed pas su/ sa byas lam/ byang chub sa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems das/ spyod pa dang / bsam pa 'ongs su shes pa'o// 
17a6(1): byang chug pa ri skye mched rnams kyi sgo ma med do// byang chub la ni bag chags thams cad kyi mtshams spyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bras rdzogs ma 'dris pa'o// byang chub la ni gnas dang gnasas
17a7(1): so khro dang bral thos srong pa grol bas tshul la gyi gan shing phyogs la myo gnas pa'o// byang chub ni nang nas kyi snam zhing de bzhin nyid pagadas 'o// byang chub ni kyi rgyas skye myi ni 'angs
17a8(1): di kya ya byed bya/ sa gyi skyed 'o// byed ni ltam kyi yo chung pas das byed pa'o/ mchub ni me bas pa mya ba
17b1(1): rgya bar myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das rab tu stand pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe// 'khor de nas lha'i bu gnyis brgya myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'o// bdag kyang spobs pa ma mchis par gyur da te/ bcom ldan
17b2(1): 'das padag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchil par myi spro'o// des nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi tsa byi gzhon nu 'od bkod pa la bka' bas la dang/ 'od bkod pa khyod litsa byi dris byed par grags pa'i nang 'dri bar song shig
17b3(1): 'od bkod pa'i sa kyang bsolang pa bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mching bar myi spro'o// de ni'i slad tu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gyis mngon par mtshal ba'i dus cig na/ bdag langs pa'i
17b4(1): thong khyer chen po nas byung ba dang / lid tsa byi dri ma myed par grags pa nad tu mchir ba dang 'jal te/ des bdag la gus par smras pa dang // bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// khyim bdag khyod ka las 'ongs zhes dris
17b5(1): pa dang des bdag la smras pa/ bdag byang chub kyi snying po nas 'ongs so// bdag la de skad ces smras pa/ byang chub snying po zhes pa de gang gi mying/ de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// byang chub kyi snying po zhes
17b6(1): bya ba de ni sgyu ma ma yin pa'i phyir da bsam pa'i snying por/ rtsom pa las/ dgrol ba'i phyir de ni sbyor ba'i snying po'o// khyad par khong du chud pa'i phyir/ de ni lhag pa'i snying po'o/ yang dag par gyi nyams pa'i
17b7(1): phyir de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi snying po'o// rnam par smin pa lasaphyi re ba'i phyir de ni sbyin pa'i snying po'o// smon lam yongs su rdzog phyir de ni tshul khrims kyi snying po'o// sems can thams cad
17b8(1): kyi sring po'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i phyir ni de ni byams pa'i ltung po'o// gnod pa thams cang bzod pa'i phyid de ni snying rje'i snying po 'o// rlom kyi dku' bal dga' zhing / thos pa'i phyir de ni ngas la
17b9(1): char yam pa dang shong khrogs po'i phyir de na ga tang snyoms kyi nyi mo'o// drugs dpa shes papa nim ni ni nga'i du men/ rgyanan pa'i phyi do rnam pa mdzadza pa'i se sa// sem can
18a1(1): yongs su spring pa'i phyir de ni snying ba'o// sems can thams cad bsrud pa'i phyir/ deni sku pa'i dngos po'i snying po'o// nad tad snying por byed pa'i phyir de ni bos pa'i snying po'o// tshul bzhin
18a2(1): mo sor rtog pa'i phyir do ni dmas pa'i sring po'o// 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa spong pa'i phyir/ de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi snying po'i// sems can thams cad ngo bo nyid byed pa'i byid de ni sems can thams
18a3(1): nakyi mi thong // slong gnyid mngon par byang chub pa'i phyir don chos thams cad kyi zhi pa'o// skye gso ba'i phyir de ni bdung thams cad joms pa'i snying por/ nga / shin tu 'dug pa dang bral ba'i phyir de ni las pa gsum
18a4(1): tha'i stong thomakyi 'jigs shing byi spungs pa'i phyir de ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi snying po'o// thams cad tu ma spang ba'i phyir de ni gobs dang / skye 'jigasu pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas
18a5(1): rtsos la sa bya ma sanyon mongs pam lus pa'i phyi de ni gsung pa'i ma // bam pa sa byed pa'i seshesas rkang ba sprums pa byed/ 'on sems kyi ga ma pacig bcom
18a6(1): cing 'a tham par 'ong drud pa'i phung thog/ de gar rigs kyi bu cicas ca byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa rolangasu phyind pa dang // ldan pa dang / sems cad mongs su skyernyed par byed pa dang ldang pa dang / 
18a7(1): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ldan par dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa mi zhom pa dro pa dang / 'deg pa dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying pol nas sa so// sangs rgyas kyi cho
18a8(1): las mongs shi / sangs rgyam gyi chom la rab tu gnas so// bcom ldan 'das rab tu bstan pa 'di shad pa na/ dung gyi lnga brgyanam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khang gagyur de nas sobs pa sa mchis
18b1(1): blang ba dang ga gyi rtag par rtog par mang du byis shig/ de bdang la 'di ga ces mchi// skyes bu dab pa de'i lha'i bu mo khA nyas/ stong po 'didag bdag la khyod kyis long la 'di dag myong byan yon gyis
18b2(1): zhig ces mching ba dang / de la bdag gis smras pa bskye byin rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po dag dge slong zhag bya'i srung lam thu ga sbyin/ 'di dag ni ring b.rung ba'i sa yin no// sa
