119a9(1): can gang sangs rgyas la pha ma phrad pa las skyes pa lta ba de dag pa ma myed par 'gyur ste/ de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi/ btsun pa gang po de bzhin gshegs pa la kha zer ba pha ma dang bral ba'o// sngon sems can gang de bzhin gshegs
119a10(1): pa'i sku rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rkang dang / khrag bcad/ myi'i khrus so zhes brdzun zeng zhing / 'jig rten pa dang mthun par 'jug pa la las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni 'jig rten na myi sdug pa skon can du 'gyur ro// 
119a11(1): ratur yang sems can de dag ni yan lag thams cad ma tshang zhing kha bsnams pa 'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa las thams cad phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang kha myi gcod pa'i dri myi zhim pa
119b1(1): mnam pan po gzhigs nyams pa/ yan lag thams cad ma chad pa 'jig rten dang mthun par 'dug pa las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/ btsun pa gang po 'jig rten thams cad kyis spangs pa'o// sems can tshus
119b2(1): cad kyi las sngar bshad pa rnams shinang tu yang ra ba yin te/ gal te phyi'i skye ba thob na yang 'jig rten gyi bsdug sngal bsam gyis myi khyab pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i gnas dang / gshin d+he'i bAsdug sngal gyi skal ba
119b3(1): can du 'gyur ro// rang gis byas pas ma rig pa yun ring por myong zhing gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis bdag nyid chen po las phyir phyogs pa de dag la dge la ba yungs 'phrul tsam yang brnyed par dka'o// sngon gang de
119b4(1): bzhin gshegs pa 'i'amang po la mnyes par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos nas se gol rtogs ka rtogs pa srid tu 'dzin na/ yang dge' ba'i brtsa pa des sems can de dag dbang po thul ba dang / phyug cing rigs
119b5(1): chen por 'gyur ro// de ltar yang sems can gang dbang po thuld cing bran gza' med pa'i khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze'i rigs chen por gyu dad pa'i sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rna pa
119b6(1): la reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par byed cing / bsod nams kyi las shi nad tu byed do// ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin te/ dgas pa'i snying po thos nas/ de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / 1
119b7(1): myi gar bram ze mang zhing rigs che ba'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/ bsod nams byas pa'i sems can don dang ldan pa yod dang mthud pa/ gzugs dang don dang / sebs dang / bsnyems
119b8(1): pa phun gsum tshogs pa/ blo gros dang / dran pa dang / yid rno ba dang ldan pa/ dbyangs yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / 'khor/ los bsgyung ba dang / de bzhin du dge'
119b9(1): zhing nga rgyab byed pa'i sems can dmyig nyid thu la pa/ bshor pa/ bag yod pa de las mtshogs pa mtho ris dang / sa'i steng gi phun gsum tshogs pa/ lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong pa la sos
119b10(1): yar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyus/ nad myed pa dang / 'tshe ba skyed pa dang / tshe nga ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa gzhung drung zer
119b11(1): zug ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'ang 'chi ba myed par thos nas/ thams cad 'byor cing / yun ring du/ sra ba dang / rtan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten thams cad dang / rjes su 'thun par 'jug pas rol dang/ 
120a1(1): yin par shes shing / gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'khrig pa la byung ba ma yin no// zhes bstod pa de dag ni le shes dang yon tan brnyed pa'i bsod nams kyis bu mang zhing ba ma ring tu mtsho ba brnyed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
120a2(1): kA pa'i snying po brtag pa sems can thams cad pa yod par shes pa'i rgyas / 'jig rten na bde ba'i rnam pa mchog rnams dang / sun gsum tshogs pa'i yod pa thams cad brnyed par 'gyur ro// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rlung po rtag par thos nas/ 
120a3(1): sngon byung ba dang / da lhar dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 'dus gsum du yang phun gsum tshogs pa thams cad dang / mtho dis dang / sa'i steng gi bde' ba thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la brnyas pa'i
120a4(1): brgyus ni 'gro ba lnga'i gnas thams cad na/ yan lag ma tshang par 'gyur ro// 'khor pa'i bsdug sngal la khyam pa na bsdug snga la myong bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sems can rnams
120a5(1): ya phan par bstond cing ga ga bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sos dpa' de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thob pa brnyed par 'gyu zhen no// btsun pa gang pos sangs rgyas mang po las phyi phyogs pa'i sems
120a6(1): bdagang de bzhi gshenas pa'i phying bathos das myod pa'i sems cad de dadag bdag nyid kyi sa sems nga kye tu gagasus sa sa rgyas kyi byub pa sgra ya b+h+yan panan/ sa po dpang
120a7(1): 'di ltar bstand te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / yang dag pa nyid shi nad tu bsngags par bya'o// de ltar myi bstond te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'dod pa de dag ni/ dper na gdold pa la/ rgyal po'i
120a8(1): ba grang lta bur de la seng ge'i khri 'ang myi 'os so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan tu btsa lad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma brnyes te/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ma
120a9(1): skyes pa mtshan dang / dpe'abyad bzang pos brgyand pa yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shinang tu nan tan du bdag nyid kyis bcal kyang dbyings byung ba ma brnyes te/ sems can thams cad la ma byung ba'i dbyings
120a10(1): sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang po mthal mas pas brgya nad pa'i dbyings yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shind tunan tan tu bdag nyid kyis btsal kyab dbyings myi btag ma nas
120a11(1): sems can thams can kha rtag pa'i dbyings/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang / dpe' byang ba lang lo/ \u0f7f/ mtha' sas pas brgyand pa'i dbyings yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal
120b1(1): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ther zhug ma yin pa ma brnyes te/ sems can thams cad la zer thug gi dbyings na/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / dpe' byang bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan dbyings yod do// sangs rgyas tham sa
120b2(1): cad kyis shin du tu nan tan tu btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsung drung ma yin pa ma rnyes te/ sems can thams cad la/ gsung drung gi dbyings/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang / dpe'abyang pa 'ang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa
120b3(1): rgyas yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shi d+ha tu bcal kyang de bzhin dgegs pa'i snying po la nan tanam pa rnyes te/ sems can tham pa la skyed pa'o dbyings saca dang /  dpe byang ba zang po sapa mam pas brgyad
120b4(1): bo'i dbyings sod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tunan tan tu brtsal kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan gem brnyes te/ sems can thams cad la gag myed pa'i dbyings/ sangs rgyas kyang dbyings macan dang / se byad
120b5(1): bzang po mtha' yas pas brgya nad pa'i dbyings yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shind tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'jig rten ma brnyes te/ myi 'jigs pa'i dbyings/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtshan
120b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi dbyings pa sems can thams cad la mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tunan tan du btsal kyang / de bzhin
120b7(1): gshegs pa'i snying po 'drim ma brnyes te/ sems can thams cad la dri ma myed pa'i dbyings/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings/ mchon dang pe 'byang bzang po mthams sa pas brgyan pa'i myangs yod de/ dbang tshul 'brular
120b8(1): ma sa phyi byig sa pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi byings kyang nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs mod kyi/ nyon mongs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi dbyings 'dres par 'byung ba'i gnas byed do// dbyings kyang nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang na 'dug mod kyi/ 
120b9(1): bum pa'i nang na mar me 'dug pa bzhin du/ bum pa bcag na sad me rab tu 'bar zhing mdzes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskond par byed pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos ni bum pa/ 
120b10(1): lta bu nyon mongs pa bye ba ni mar mye lta bu ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po pa stond par byed pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon mongs pa myed pa 'am/ su yang nang ste/ de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// btsun bkang po
121a1(1): ma'i steng du myi snang zhing / sprin las grol na pA ba dang / nyi ma sa'i steng du snang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye bas khebs myi snang ngo // zla ba dang nyi ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa las grol na sangs
121a2(1): rgyas kyi dbyings nyi ma dang / zla ba yang snang ngo // kye ma btsun pa gang po khyod ni sprang bu'i spyod pa lta bu spyod do// chos kyi btam pa nyon myi shes so// sprang bu yang sgra 'byind na de yang shes pa yin nam/ lan gnyis su
121a3(1): ma sma bar sA bu khyod myurab tu song shig// de ras gnas gtan ma rjes dgas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sor mo'i phreng pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ka legs so legs so// 
121a4(1): de nas sor mo'i phreng bas mdzes dga' la sngar 'di skad ces smras / btsun pa mdzes dga' khyod ni byad bzhin bzang po'i mcho yin na/ 'jig rten na rab tu byad bzhin bzang ba gang / ji ltar na gyi
121a5(1): rnams kyi gzugs dang / mdzes pa bzang por 'gyur/ myur tu smras te the tsom gcod cig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng pa la mdzes dgas spras pa/ lag pa rab bkrus sor bcu rab sbyad te/ de bzhin gshegs
121a6(1): ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing // rtag tu nad pa'i rim 'gro byed pa ni// de la skyes bu byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur// sor mo'i phreng pas mdzes dka' la srar smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
121a7(1): rus pa yang myed/ rgyas pa 'ang myed na/ sku gtung dang / ring spel g.yod de/ ring srel byed pa thabs kyi mchog/ chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis myi khyab ste// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam
121a8(1): gyis myi khyab pa'i'o// ma dad pa rnams dad pa skyed pa'i phyir ring srel bzhag pa'i thabs mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten bya ba'i ring srel bzhag go// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid de/ 'jig rten gyi tshangs pa/ 
121b1(1): dang ga dbang phyug dang / kat+ya'i bu mo dang / 'gro bsnyems gzhon nu'i gsugs khang pa dang / so/ b+hag gi khyim ginas su ma byad bcos ma'i gzugs rnam pa mang po byas te bzhag la/ de dag skyabs ma yin par
121b2(1): byas pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gtung ba ltar thabs yin par shes pa de ni 'jig rten na/ myi byad bzhin bzang ba'i myi yin te/ thabs kyi ye shes kyi rtsa ba des gzugs mdzes par 'gyur gyi/ rtog
121b3(1): gzhan ni byis pa ltar 'khyal ba yin no// mdzes dag khyod gzugs pa mang por 'gyur ba'i sgo yang phyi shes so// khyim btsun pa mdzes dga' khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa myod de/ gzugs 'byung ba'i sgo yang gyi
121b4(1): shes so// sbrang bu yang gzugs phran gsum tshogs pa yod kyis/ sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma med cig/ de nas gnas gtan nye dbang 'khoradad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
121b5(1): sod mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis mthun pa dang / rjes su dgo ras pa'i bsod nams byas pa yang dga'o// sor mo'i breng
121b6(1): pa khyod da 'dul ba la brtson par gyis shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng pas gnas rtan nye spyod la skad smras pa/ btsun pa nye spyod la khyod 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog na/ 'jig rten na 'dul ba
121b7(1): 'dzind pa gang / ji ltar na 'dul ba bca' ba la mkhas pa yin/ myur tu spros te/ nga'i the tsom chod cig/ de nas gnas brten nye sbyor gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa thos
121b8(1): da kyi bya ste// dge ba rnams ni rdzogs par bya// rang gi sems kyang yongs su dul// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang // lus pa bsgom pa'i ming po'o//  nas mo ma phreng pas gnas pan te spyad pa 'i
121b9(1): skad ces smras so// skyon chags pa'i yang tshan can rnams kyi nor dang / chos gos la brdzogs pa dang / glegs lam dang / skur med dang / chu tshags dang / ka rags dang / khab rnams thams cad du thams cad tu dgag cing blang bar/ 
121b10(1): bya ste/ mye 'grungs pa tshar gcad cing nan thur bya ba yin no// de thams cad ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i nor te/ skyon chags pa'i yang tshen can gyi nod ma yin no// dper na rgyal po ral gyi gdol pa'i khyim na 'jug na/ 
122a1(1): ral gyi de'i mthus phrogs kyang nyes pa myed do// de ni gdol pa'i nod ma yin gyi rgyal po'i dkor ro// de bzhin du de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i nod te/ bzung nas nan gyis khyer ba de ni 'jig rten na 'dul ba 'dzinan
122a2(1): ba ste/ de la nyes byas tsam gyi ltung ba 'ang myed de// cho ga dang kyi ldan pa 'ang ma yin te// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' rdzogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang mtshungs par
122a3(1): gzigs pa'o// kye ma btsun pa nye sbyong ni sbrang bu'i pyad pa lta bu spyod de// 'dul ba bsdus pa'i snying po myi shes so// sprang bu yang byas pa shes kyis/ sprang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu da gyur
122a4(1): pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag mtshal nas/ sor mo'i byed pa la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// sor mo'i phreng bang khyod kyis mthun pa dang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa/ 
122a5(1): nga dga'o// da ni chos la stong pa ji yang myed par bya'o// de nas sor mo'i/ phreng bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la slar 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod stong pa chen po mthong ba'i mchog na
122a6(1): 'jig rten na stong pa mthong ba gang yin/ spyod pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i don ci shes pa chen po dang ldan pa myu nga tu smos te/ 'i bre com myu nga tu tshod cig/ de nas 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
122a7(1): sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu ste/ tshenam mkha'i mtshan nyid myed pa'o// sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu se/ nam mkha' mtshan ma myed las skyes
122a8(1): sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu ste// nam mkha' gzugs myed gyur pa'o// chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// ye shes nas mkha' lta bu he// de bzhin gshegs cam
122a9(1): ye shes sku// gzung du myed cing dag tu myed// chags myed ye shes de bzhin gshegs// tha da pa nam mkha' lta bu ste// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid myed/ tha dad pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs
122a10(1): stong po rje yang myed pa dag/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis ga la shes// de nas sor mo'i phreng bas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la slar 'di skad ces smras so// dper na sprin po khas char rab tu 'bab pa dang / skyes bu byis
122b1(1): pa'i rang bzhin gyis ser ba'i 'bru blangs te/ nor bu rin po che bye cu rgyang bsams nas/ khyim du khyer ba dang / ha char grangs ches nas bzung ma nus te// gter du bya'o snyams nas bum pa'i nang ru legs par bcug pa dang / ser ba'i ril+ya
122b2(1): de zhu par mthong nas stong pa'o snyam ste/ cang kyi med par gyur pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jam dpal shin tu stong pa nyid snyoms shika/ sbyor pa rab tu byasams da pas chos thams cad zhig pa snad panam thang // 
122b3(1): tha dad pa stong pa ma yin pa la yang stong par mthong zhing rtog go// 'di lta dper sa/ ser ba'i di su nor bu sum tu bsams nas/ nor bu yang stong par bsgom pa de bzhin du ga khyod kyang skor pa ma yin pa'i cho ba la song bar mos
122b4(1): ste/ chos stong pa mthong nas sor pa ma yin pa'i chos la yang stong par 'dzind par byed do// song pa'i chos kyang gzhan/ sor pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan te/ ser ba'o lu lta bur nyon mongs pa dang bye ba ni stong pa'o// 
122b5(1): ser ba'i ri lu lta bu myi dge' ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams ni myu rang tu 'jig go// nor bu bye du skya bzhin du sangs rgyas ni rtag pa ste/ tha rad pa'i mtha' yang nor bu bye tu brgya bzhin no// ba nam mkha' yang sangs rgyas kyi
122b6(1): gzugs yin te// nyan thos dang nga sangs rgyas bams cad kyi gzugs byed pa yin to// sangs rgyas pa nga pa yang gzugs yin te/ nyan thos dang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma tha dad pa'i gzun rgyab
122b7(1): da nan// spang bag pa'i sa da pong zhes bya/ dpe da'i sasas skyed // 'ayangs la gang grong byed ba ba'i khyis tho nga tu myod pa ma myong ba'o// bum bu kyi bye
122b8(1): bas yong do// klung ni chu myi 'bab pas stong ngo // ci klong gi bar bsgrubs kyi khyim pa la sor pa stong pa zhes bya 'am/ rje khyim thams cad spyod pa yin nas/ thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ myi myed pas stong
122b9(1): zhes bya'o// ji bum pa thams cad stong pa yin nas// thams cad song pa nyid ma yin gyi// chu myed pas sor zhes bya'o// ji klung thams cad song pa yin nam/ thams cad son pa ma yin gyi/ rdza mya 'bab pa'i
122b10(1): phyir song zhes bya'o// de bzhin tu tha dad pa thams cad kyis god pa ma yin gyi/ nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir tha dad pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni song pa ma yin te/ nyes pa thams ca
123a1(1): dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa'i bye ba'i mying dang /  myed pa'i phyir sod pa zhes bya'o// kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni sbrang bu'i daspyad pa 'apyod pa ste/ stong pa dang myi stong pa'i don ni de kho na myi
123a2(1): kAshes so// gcer bu pa yang thams cad stod pa stor ba le// gcer bu ba spang ma khyod cang ma zerd cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sor mo'i phreng ba la skar 'di skad ces smras so// sor mo'i phreng
123a3(1): pa khyod 'brog 'gond pa na/ stag bzhin tu nyan thos thams cud gsod na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras rnams la ma brnyas shig/ sprang bu lta bu khyod su zhig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon
123a4(1): nur gyurard pa phal 'di skad ces smras so// dper na 'byam po yi dgas lta bur pa kren pa dag lam du zhugs na/ sa ga gi dri mnam pa tsam gyis kun tu 'bros pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos rnams kyang theg pa chen po myi shes pas/ 
123a5(1): 'byam po lta bur byang chub sems dpa'o dri mnam na kun tu bros so//  dper na seng ge'i rgyal pos/ ri khrod nas seng ge'i mthu'arten sathal dkyis sgra bsgrags na/ seng ge'i sgra thol bas ri dgas dang
123a6(1): zhal sogs pa thams cad kyi mtshol zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin hUM/ byang chub sems dpa' ser ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ seng ge na mthu' brtsal gyis nim par brjod pan/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra
123a7(1): chos nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad sem po dag las kun tu myom mo// ngas kyang de zhig zhwa'i sgra byung na yang nyan thos thams can lan mon gyi nus/ gal te seng ge'i sgra byung na/ nyan thos rnams rjes
123a8(1): 'gyur/ de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyu rad pas/ sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so// sbrang bu lta bu khyon su zhig/ sor mo'i phreng pas shind tu gtum po'i las byas so// phyod lta bu yang byang chub
123a9(1): sems dpa' yin du zi nad na/ bdud sdig can 'dra'/ kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni bdag nyid myi shes te/ bdag gi nyes pa myi mthong zhing // gzhan gyi nyes pa mthong ngo // sor mo'i phreng bas sdig ji snyed cig byas/ 
123a10(1): drin sa sor mo'i phreng bas 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur dpa la 'di skad ces spram zo// kyes 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i skyes bu gnyis yod do// ga bzhin du song pa nyid tulta ba dang / gang 'jig rten

123b2(1): kye ma byang chub sems dpa' steg rnams 'jigs pa myed pa'o snyam cu sems na/ kye ma btsun pa 'jas dpal ni sbrang bu dang seng ge'i bye brag kyang myi shes so// btsun pa 'jam dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas sngags pa'i byang
123b3(1): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon cig/ dper na sgyu ma'i rgyal los/ sgyu ma la 'dus pa'i dpung ji ltar gcod pa dang / gtub pa bston te/ smra ma de de bas bza' ba dang / rnyes pa yang bstodade/ sgyu ma byed pa rnam pa mang po
123b4(1): ma byed pa'i sgyu mchog ji lta ba bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstand pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sha ste ga nams su ya/ bdag nyid skye ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur sgyu ma rnam pa mang po ba ston te/

123b6(1): rnams la ni myi rtag par bston to// snyam sa/ thams cad mtshon lpags su byas nas sangs rgyas phan tshun tu gsod pa bstan kyang / sems can gcig la yang gnod par myi 'gyur te/

123b10(1): rnas pa gang dang gang gis sems can la phan par 'gyur ba bran dang slob mar yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rmong myi dang ded dpon dang / mthun no 'don du bya'ang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / gzhon nu dang / grong dpon dang / 
124a1(1): tshogs thams cad kyi na tu yang sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid 'dum par sbyab sa dang / mthun par byed do// lha thams cad du 'ang 'gyur te/ de dag ni lta ba zlog pa'i phyir/ tham gca/

124a3(1): ru/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na sgyu ma byed pa'i rang bzhin yin par lta ste/ de bzhin tu sems can rnams bsad pa yang shes par bya'o// sgyu ma byed pas spu ma'i skyes bu ji lta ba de bzhin du// sgyu ma 'phruld pa nyid spyod tu gcig
124a4(1): gis ma tshang ba'i de lta bus da 'dul bI dbang gos sgyu ma srul te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma lanangs kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgyu ma 'di dag sku lad do// kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni

126a6(1): rang sangs rgyas so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu/ ro mtshand rnam pa gnyis te/  rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'dod chen pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas su ngo mtsha rang
126a7(1): gyu rad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa las mtho' ba'i mchog gzhan myi snang me/ ngo mtsha dad to// dma' ba'i gnas su yang 'dod mangs las gzhan myi snang bor/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams
126a8(1): pha rol du phyind pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod che ba 'am/ 1pha rol tu phyind pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o// dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi
126a9(1): sbyin pa'i pha rold tu byind pa la bdag gi bre dang / dmyig dang / she byed pa'i phung po ri rab pas che ba// de bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa 'ang / 'dod chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyid pa
126a10(1): rdzogs par byed do// 'dod chen pa yang napa yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du sor ba'i de'i tshe / de dag yes pa'i sems skyes te/ de'i tshe myu ra tu bud myed mang po 'byung ste/ bu mang po yang 'byung ro// sems can gyis
126b1(1): rgyas zede' ba nga thob padag la 'gyur/ de nas spyang du bdag gi bza' ba'i sems skyes nas la'o// / yang las kyi bram ze'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// des slong ba rnams la yang bu rnams byir te/ byin pa de dag kyang na
126b2(1): yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad pa ste/ de ltar 'dod chen po yang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa 'is ro lan du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin rtsu la rolang tu phyind pa bcu 'ongs su rdzogs par byed do// de'i byer mam can
126b3(1): gnas kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so// dma' ba'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnams so// btsun pa me'u 'gal kyi bu de ltar ngo mtshad rnam pa gnyis te/ log par nges pa'i gang lag ni 'dod chen po yin/ 
126b4(1): brar moms shi// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i gang zag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par soms shig// de nas bcom ldang 'das kyis song mo'i phreng ba pa bka' sa ya pa/ zang bar
126b5(1): phreng mardzu shod// b+hur tu rab tu byung la skyabs gsub tu 'gro bar zung shig/ te/ de nas sor mo'i phred pas bcom ldan 'das mtshigs su bcad la 'an drag gis su gsongon pa// breg pa de ni theg chen ste/ chags byed
126b6(1): ye shes zhes kyang bgyi// theg pa chen po skyabs gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pas don dam skyabs// chos dang sangs rgyas don cigate// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// dgel 'dun de bzhin thaca
126b7(1): gshenas kyi phying/ dge' 'dun nyid ni de bzhin gshegs// chos dang dge'u bdun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te// de bzhin gnyen pa ni thabs skyed sbubs dang don das skyabs// de bzhin gshegs
126b8(1): pa skyabs myed rnams kyi skyabs lags te// de bzhin gshegs la skyabs su mchi'// ji ltar shing kun pa 'dod pas na shing kun pa bya ste// shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos ma ra ba ni// 'jig rten dag na
126b9(1): bdag la myi phan nad kyang sos myi 'gyur// 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs myed sman pa stong gis gso' myi nus// de bzhin du ni skyabs cig yongs btang ste// skyabs kyi skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang // de lta bu ni spang bu
126b10(1): gnang dbyed pa// ngan langs rnam grang gis gsor myi nus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma ya pa// tshan mang mo'i bring ba khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims bsrungs shika/ de nas son mo'i phred pas bcom ldan 'das / 
126b11(1): 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gzhon nur gang lags/ snyen pa rdzogs pa gang lags/ 'jig rten dge sbyong gsal pa gang legs// 'jig rten na sbyin gang+gA gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung
127a1(1): bar gyur pa dang // sbom mo'i sred pas/ bcog ldan 'das la 'dis dpes gsos to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten na skyab sa cig sodon dam pa'i yubs sus mamal bdag pas gnyis pol
127a2(1): bkod do// de gnyis kyi 'jig rten na skyabs lags te/ gzhon nur gyu nas pastend par rdzogs par myi gsal bde dge' sbyong lags sam/ gang skyabs cig pa sa 'amald pa de dag skyag le su bskyod pa dag la 'gyur/ 
127a3(1): gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyab su ma mtshald pa de dag thogs nas skyabs su 'gro ba yangs sbyangs na/ dge sbyong tu ga la 'gyur// de lur skyabs mche' ba nga gsas par ma mtsham na/ skyid pa'i gnasu
127a4(1): lhag bgyur// gang grubs dang gang thabs kyi skyams dang / bye brag sa mtshal pa de ni 'jig rten na gzhon nu myi mkhas pa'o// bcom kun rnam kyis bka'as ya pa g.yon ma da ma'i phreng ba rgyad srog gcod
127a5(1): srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to// srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mongs byeb deni de dag bzung nas gang gsod pa ni 'jig rten gcod/ brnam pa'i 'dzin pa'o// de dag gsad pa 'am yang brgyags
127a6(1): rnapa bcom ste/ bdag gi slob par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHla da pa/ 'on sor mo'i phreng ba khyod brdzund tu smra spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas sngar 'di
127a7(1): skad ces gsol to// bdag ni brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims myi 'dzind to// chos thams cad ni myi bden pa ste/ bdag myi bden pas smra ba'i chos stond to// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid de/ myi bdenas
127a8(1): zhes bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang brdzun tu smra ba zhes bgyi'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i baspyod pa/ 'jig rten
127a9(1): rang mthun pa'i rjes su 'dug pa rnams kyang myi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o// bdag 'jig rten du skyes te//  rab tu byung nang brtend pa rdzogs nas/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob bo// gzhan gyis sbyin pa'i/ 
127a10(1): rol tu phyind pa la pyad do// bdag 'jig rten na chug go/ bad karma dgu' nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o// bdag lham 'tshal lo// bdag gis so shing blang ngo // bdag gis dmyig rtse byug go// bdag sgo mo// 
127b1(1): bdag nyid rjon go// bdag nyid mgo 'breg go// bdag ma la du zhugs te nyal lo// rked pa na ba zhig zung // bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung dang / 'thus pazhin thung ste// bdag nyid sman gtum
127b2(1): bdag ni ning ba me bzhin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la chags pa pa chos bams cad na myi bden pa de/ cimam thubabs kyis bya ba dang / 'jig rtenan bams kyi bya ba lang rnag yongs su spyod pa'i brdzun
127b3(1): smra ba'i tshul khrims rgya spyod do// de kha na'i chos bden 'ag pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyis nga la nyon cig/ btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid don dam pa'i sku'o/ 
127b4(1): ga pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ ther zug gi sku/ brtan pa'i sku ste/ chos kyi sku/ zhi ba'i sku/ chos kyi sku// de kho na las skyes pa'i sku de ji
127b5(1): rko dang / de bas na myi bden pa'i chos kyis byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bsand pa thams cad ni myi bden pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// dpe na pa glang rdzi dag be'u shi bags pas be'u ltang byas te/ 
127b6(1): maphrenganas 'a dug nan sa tu 'jug pa de ba ts+tsha/ 'dag rten gyi rdzas 'grang nang spyod pad/ yangs rgyaman 'ong ba gapung gyu nas mad bsod/ bzang rdzi dang / bas ngon pa dmas kya/ na/ #
127b7(1): bcag gi de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'odapa yang 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o// gas se shin du dga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa'o// 
127b8(1): nam du sems shing / bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyigatso bor 'gyur ngo snyas su sems so// chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid pa skur te/ de bzhi gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'dod pa
127b9(1): bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so// gal te be'u dngos po slang snyad na/ gnod yang myi rung / len du yang myi rung ste/ ba yang rdzi be'u gsobs pa na te/ rtsa spang gang byin nas myi mden pa'i chos la 'dul ba
127b10(1): byed do// de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dron dam pa'i sku/ 'jig rten du bstan bu 'i nad na/ sku de sus mthong bar nus te/ ji ltar ba glang za'i chang ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes 'brang ba'i byed
127b11(1): bas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no// de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yang lag gang dang gis/ sems cadan rnams chos la brtson par sems can mang po yongs su sbyin par mdzad de/ de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi
128a1(1): yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH yad pa/ 'on sor mo'i phreng ba khyod chang thud pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la skar tshigs su gcad pas
128a2(1): slod gsol pa // chang la spangs pa'i tshul khrims khadag kyi 'dzind/ 6/ chang la myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzid// dra thungs pa ni nga rgyal skyes par brjod// 'gro 'chags rtag tu rab bde'i chang zhes bgyi'o// bde'i gshegs snying po
128a3(1): theg pa che las skyes// khu ba thungs nas skyes bu ngoms par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag brtan ther zug ces/  rab tu dga' doms hag legs brjod pa/ phun gsum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
128a4(1): bka' maHla da pa// 'o na son mo'i phreng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spangs/ dpa'i tshul khrims bsrungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsold te/ 
128a5(1): bdagan 'dzin pa smras pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'di/ rtag tun gyi bud myed gsem sa chags 'dzin/  da ga sung pa gas kyimi na myod// bu bye kyan sre 'a ra tu chags/  'dzin #
128a6(1): ro ni bdag gi nud ma se// chos gzhan dga' sa gzhan gyi bud myed chags// dpa' zhing don la dga' ba bad gi bu// snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste// bsod pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim lags so// g.yas kyang pha rol da phyind pa
128a7(1): bdag gi lam// nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g.yog lags te// zas ni ldem ngan gsang bas/ nad pa lags// padag gis skyed mo 'tshal ni gzugs rnams ste// byang chub yan lag me tog bdag gi brgyand/ 
128a8(1): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste// bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni stong po lag/ de la tshogs pa khyim nas che dga' mchog/ byis pa rnams kyi pyod yul 'di ma lags// 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos
128a9(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sam pad pa// 'on sor mo'i phreng ba ma byin pa lend pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas song mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol dpa// bdag ni
128a10(1): mabyin me dang srong khrims kyi 'dzid / gzhad dang ku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin/ ma byid pa'i byang chub lags zhes bgyig// de ni sus kyang sul 'das sa ya te// nga bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas kyang /  kyi
128b1(1): rnyed pa ni myed cing bshig pa 'ang myed// de ni chos rnams kund kyi rang bzhin te// de ni bla na myed pa'i mchog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ldad pa/ 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod gar dang / rol mo spangs pa'i tshul
128b2(1): khrims zud shig/ de nas brnam ldan 'das la/ sor mo'i phreng bas/ tshogs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsolang to// bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bapyid de// dri za'i dbyangs snyand sgrog cing glu dbyangs bro
128b3(1): brdungs te/ legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'o snying po bstond// legs brjod gang ba pyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos// myi 'am ci lta bu sgra bstand theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klag/ myi 'am ci dang / 
128b4(1): dri za'i rnga dang / rnga bran dang / sil snyan dag gis glegs pa ma la 'ang mchod par bgyi// sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchog bgyi e// de dag 'jig rten tu ni khong mor mying cig par// phyis dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de
128b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa gang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka sas la da tshi me pa/ 'on sor mo'i phreng ba khyod cig ces bslobs shig/ sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// ji cig ce na/ 
128b6(1): semyas can mas ca ni las la mnos nas nyan pos kyi theg pa byung ba'i tshig ste/ reg pa chen po sa des bu'i dam sams sa // da tshon po pa rnam pa'i rtag tu phyig kyi 'dradu ma zhing btad pa tham
128b7(1): dzag cen/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos gnas pa'o// ni gnyis zhe na/ phyir dang gzugs kyi tshiganyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba ste/ reg pa chen po ma lags so// 
128b8(1): myong dang / gzugs ni de lta lags te/ mying dang / gzugs rnam pa m+bu lags so// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas pa dang pa ni phyi sa te/ gzugs dbang byings phyi na no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi da
128b9(1): rje/ lag zil na sU nu da'i gzugs bzhin no// ji gsum zhe na/ tshor pa gsum nyan thos kyi theg pa la sa byung te/ theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi ma lags so// tshor pa 'di gsum ste/ dag de bzhi gshegs pa'i chos la skye rtag
128b10(1): par 'gyur ro// nyes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro zhes pagyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor pa'o// dge la 'dun myi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos po'i tshor ba ste// de gsum theg pa chen po'i chod pa'o// 
128b11(1): ji bzhi gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa las grags pa'i tshig ste// theg pa chen po la shin tu bden pa ste// sdug sngal ba ni bde pa ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zhug go zhes bgyi / 
129a1(1): de ni shinang tu bden ste/ kun tu 'byung ba'i ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ther zug gi mchog go zhes bkye ba ni/ shinan tu bder gyi 'gog pa ni ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhi pa'o// 
129a2(1): kAzhes bya ba de ni shinan tu bden gyi/ lam ni ma yin te// theg pa chen po la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o// sdug sbal gyi bya ba bden pa ma lags so// sdug sngal gyi bya ba bden rtsa lags na// sdug sngal rnams
129a3(1): ba bzhi'i bden par 'gyur te// dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bde' ba bzhir 'gyur ro// ji lnga zhe na/ dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos
129a4(1): kyi theg par krugs pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la ma lags so// dbang po lnga ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar lta'o// zhes ma tshad ba myed par bsgom pa de ni phyi rig go// de bzhin gshegs pa rtan no
129a5(1): zhes thos nas ma tshang ba myed par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa'i dri snams nas/ ma tshang ba myed par bsgom pa de ni// sna'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro skyong nas ma tshang ba
129a6(1): skyed par bsgom pa de ni sde'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'o// zhes pa de'i ro'i mchog thom shing re gnas ma chad pa myed par bsgom pa mi lus so// ji drug ce na/ skye mched drug ces nya thos kyi then thaca
129a7(1): ba la grags pa'i chog ste// theg pa chen po la bye mched drug gi rnam pa 'di myed do// skye mched drug ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar lta'o zhes 'od sgo rnams rdzogs par sgom pa de ni dmyig gi skye mched do// 
129a8(1): de de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni pa'i sku mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas/ thogs pa gos pa de 'i lnga'i skye sachedan do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
129a9(1): po'i stand pa 'os pa'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni lce'i skye mched do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i na chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i thod dam pa nya dad pa dang // reg pa'i sgom pa de ni lus kyi skye mched de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa
129a10(1): gsal khar bstond pa la 'khrugs pa myed pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par dad pa 'ong ba'i sgo'i skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched de/ ji bdun zhe na/ byang chub yan lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi theg par grags pa'i tshig go// theg pa chen pos
129b1(1): yang bdun po de dag mu rgyas 'ba' da'i me tog rgyas pa'i bzhin du brnyed par dka' ba'i tshig/ byang chub kyi yan lag btsun po de dag ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pas shind tu me tog rgyas pa brgyan no// ji brgyad ces/ 'phags
129b2(1): pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di las kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po yang dag par lta ba la 'bogs 'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa di d+ha/ 
129b3(1): pa'i mchog go zhes zhes rab tu bstond pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos shing na bar reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam sayang dag par thob bo// de bzhin
129b4(1): gshegs pa ni rta ka pa zer thug ka yung rung gi mchog gsil bar gyudad pa/ shis pa ni sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying po dga' ba myed do// zhes bya ba yan lag brgyad
129b5(1): rmi man par rig par bya'o// nges shen/ mdo na dang / yang lag su na/ da nyin thos kyi zag pa las grags pa'ojog te/ les pa sa 'di la da sogs pa byed pa'i leshes zag pa dzig rgyano/ 
129b6(1): de bcu she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sobs ba zhes nyan thos kyi thegs grags pa 'dzag ste// theg pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa ra stobs bcum yin gyi/ ma' mam mam
129b7(1): zhes bya'o// de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis myi khyab cing bsam du myed pa ste/ stobs mtha' yas par mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mdo' semala' yas pa ldem po rag tu banonon
129b8(1): pa'o// 'di ni lam cig zo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa cig gi skyabs cig/ bden pa cig gis phyir 'brang ba/ khams cig pa/ 'gro ba cig pa/ kha dogacig pa ste/ de bas bden pa cig ces bya'o// 
129b9(1): gzhan gyi zhabs kyi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la logs so bya ba byind te// legs so sogs so// sor mo'i phreng ba lenas mo// sor mo'i phreng ba khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pas sor mo'i phreng
129b10(1): bachur shog/ dge slong sor mo'i phreng ba khyod tshur shog/ ces bka' sam lad pa dang / sod mo'i phreng sto m+bod du lon pa bzhin du ka thams cad dge slong dang mthun par myod lam mdzes par gyur to// de nas sor mo'i dre ba la
130a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mchi'o// zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig byung ma zag tu der 'bras bu'i mchog/ dgra bcom pa thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
130a2(1): bka' lam pa pa/ sor mo'i phreng pa chur sho ga/ mdzel ta'i tshal du sems can bye ba mang po sgom zhing / ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'dong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba dang / thabs cig tu sha ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal
130a3(1): kyi bu dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la sotsogs pas mdun tu btard cing skor te/ nam mkha' la zla ba nya paSh+Ti zas bskord pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa/ shing mya ngan myed pa'i drung nas/ nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ 
130a4(1): gang tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sor mo'i phreng bar thod pa'i sa nas mdze' ta'i tshal gyi bar du gnas pa'i dgongs pa'i bzhi bcud 'dom gang skyed pa'i bar tu gshegs so// de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma wA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam ma
130a5(1): lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos mchod pa cher byas te/ mdze' ta'i tshul tu 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rad pa'i/ de rgyal po bzhin du rgyal lu rgyal byed kyi mtshal// mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun
130a6(1): dka'ang ba gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khral bzhugs// de nas song gsum rgyu sa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'am lags sa bzhin du gyud ci/ gos gaN yin dag yang regan ge / 6
130a7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams pa de la ba can bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas phyogs thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' so so'i de bzhin gshegs pas de de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya bub pa dang / se ge btag chen po dang zab mo chen po bkye
130a8(1): nas sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing chos kyi gtam bton te/ sor mo'i phreng ba'i bdag nyid chen po mthor bar 'gyur gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig/  rtse dang ldan pa deng shig/ ces pabye ba ste/ sod mo'i phreng ba ltar lpags so// 'byang chu
130a9(1): sems dpa' de na ka phyogs ched dang de nas me tog li lam shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab po// sems can gang dang / gang dag gis pad mo'i dri la reg par gyu dad pa'i sems can tham su nyon mongs pa myed par gyur to// de nas lha dang / sku dang ga gnod
130a10(1): sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lha'i bu mo mang po s+ya/ lha'i mchod pa chen pos byas te/ rim po che sna tshogs kyi chang yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ mgrin cig du/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis smras
130a11(1): so// brgyad bzhi mtshan chad yon tan rgya che mnga'// pad mo'i chos rgyas bzhin du zhal yang mdzes// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mdzes pa ltar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa dam pa mdun mtho' gzugs
130b1(1): mchog mtha'/ byams mchog sngags pa'i yon tan mang po 'chang // pad ma mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag dges chungs
130b2(1): phyed mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha myi mchog gos mchod// pad ma mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/ nam mkha' la ni lnga ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod/ spu'i thika le mdzem la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
130b3(1): rten dge mtshungs myed mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha myi mchog gis mchod// pad ma mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la/ phyag 'tshal lo// 
130b4(1): zer zug dgel mchog yon tan rgya che mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha myi mchog gis mdzes// pad ma mchog rgyas bzhin tu mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra' bar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// 
130b5(1): zhi dge mtshungs myed mchog yangs yon tan mda'// thub pa dam pa lha myi mchog gi mchod// pad mo rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod sku'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// 
130b6(1): mdzod 'chang tshul khrims yon tan mtha' yas 'chang// sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa cig 'dzin theg pa chen po bskyond// byams 'chang sor phreng khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas lus
130b7(1): 'dzin bdag kyang mtha' las 'dzid// mtha' yas g.yang 'dzin/ mtha' yas blo gros 'chang// mor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la/ phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' mas 'od 'changs pa' las ldem ngas sond// 16
130b8(1): sor mo'i phreng rdzogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yam 'tsha mtha' yas bcud rnams 'phrul nyon mongs phyebye ba rnam parasbyin byed 'chad// sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas/ 
130b9(1): yongs su mya ngan 'da' byed cing // mtha' yas skye sond 'jig rten rjes su 'jug/ dpa'o mchog mda' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phred pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
130b10(1): dani yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na// de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te/ zhugs 'ji lta bu lags// ra'i tha dad pa'i sa la gnas so zhes bka' sal dang / 
130b11(1): tshig de la dad par babyir myi rdung na/ 'di la de'i btan tshigs bshad tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saN+Dald pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa dang lhan cig deng la// 'di nas byang phyogs logs su
131a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i lung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten gyi khams mangs pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dgal bas bskyed du myed pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
131a2(1): kA sangs rgyas blo gros spyad du myed pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po lta zhugs te 'tshor zhing bzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pags
131a3(1): kya grub pa bzhugs pa bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mthal la gnas so// zhes gsungs na/ dzaM lA bu lags zhes zhus shika/ de nas 'dabs dpal gzhon du byur pa dang / son mo'i phreng ba legs so legs so zhes gsol da du// rdza 'phrul rgya
131a4(1): pa'i stobs kyis/ rang ba'i rgyal po ltar dge bas bskyed du myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas// bcom ldan 'das blo gros bskyed du byed pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa gal pa der do
131a5(1): kyi bar byen nas/ de bzhi gagags pa 'inapas la man pas 'a te/ bam ldad 'as lags 'ad pa// bcom nasas ga ma zhi gshenas pa gas bya pas/ sa
131a6(1): tsas nas sa shes sa das la gnon sa zung pa dang / sa ma'i phred pag 'dis sa pas 'do// rigs kyi bla ba gshegs pags kyu ma pa gang med pa 'i/ shegs pa de yin 'o// de bdi gzugs de na
131a7(1): kyi 'dzig rted kyid de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa des bdag cag 'di sa sa kyi zhes sto shin/ denas 'angs dpal gnon du byud pa dang/ mang po'i byung / ma myu 'i gams
131a8(1): bos phyag 'tshal nas dga'o zhes smras so// das pa'i rgyal po bzhin du slang 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das gal 'de logs su thal po sbyang sa bdud nas bcos san 'das la 'di skad ces gsolan to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
131a9(1): gshegs pa ni dpag tu ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtha' yas so// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshi gnyid bdag cag gis mthod te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bskyed du myed pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas
131a10(1): sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po na/ de bzhin gshegs bkag kyi thub pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yon to// )/ zhes tshig brjod nas bdag cag sar bkye nas rgya sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bzhugs bzhin du
131b1(1): brdzi ltar ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bsadang du gsold/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa/ nga ji ltar blo gros bskyed du myed pa'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sa'i rabang phyug rgyal por gyur cig/ dka' ba spyad du byed pa'i 'dzi/ 
131b2(1): rten gyi khams ni/ ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug bzhin du de na ji ltar gnas// 'di na 'dug la ma skyes pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas zhes ma zer cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mtha' yas so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' yas par rtsuba'o// 
131b3(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mtshungs pa skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshungs par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dpag tu myed de// de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu myed par 'gyur ba'o// sor mo'i phreng ba ji ltar na/ 
131b4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni skyes par gyur pa// de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / sangs rgyas sonod par 'gyur ro// de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das ses
131b5(1): cad thams cad la thugs rdzib dang / phan pa dang / bde' ba'i sad d+ha/  legs par bshad tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH lad ba/ sor mo'i phreng pa ngas bskal pa stong phrag bcur pa ro med du phyin
131b6(1): bsrung pang/ thams dang yang dag par zlas te/ sems pa kyang / chub tusem rdzas sgrub pa'i sems can bye ba mang po byang rab la kod de/ dge ya bdes pa sus pa 'ad pa bye ba mang po grang sa byed #
131b7(1): byed pa dang / de na pa'ag pa ma byas pa'i sra ma po'i phreng ba sogs 'das/ bcom ldan 'as bde gshegs pa ma byung ba'i sra byang pa/ chom 'du'/ 
131b8(1): kyis bka' ba yang pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang 'ga' klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba// glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba/ de bzhin
131b9(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te// mtsho' zhing bzhes so// sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / lhan cig tum byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i
131b10(1): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par deng la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
131b11(1): bzhugs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni ltar gnas pa dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurard pa dang / sor mo'i phreng bas/ legs so// legs so zhes gsold nas/ rang pa'i rgyal lo ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi sobs kyi rkang
132a1(1): pas/ ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sor nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin
132a2(1): ka nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin du/ zhugs pa dang / snga ma bzhin 'dir lhags nas/ sor mo'i phreng ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar
132a3(1): nam byung ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsolang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH lad pa/ sor mo'i phreng bang bskal da la brgyad stor mang por/ pha rold tu phyind pa bcus sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sngon sa byung ba'i
132a4(1): bde' ba la rab tu bkod pas ra'i lus bskasang pa mang por chad byed grangs myed pa'i pha ro la tu phyin pa las/ ma byung ba'i lus su gyurd to// ra sor mo'i phreng bas gsol du ba// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'jig rted rgya khams/

132a6(1): cha phrog cas bya bde de bzhin gshegs par gra bco pa dag pa rmongs pa'i sangs rgyas blo rlos mye zad pa zhes bya ba khur bathun mas te/ mtsho nang bzhes kyis de pazhin gshegs pade sa/ chom 'an 'a
132a7(1): shas kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du lasku'o// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba na/

132a9(1): pa'ang gong ma bzhin tu bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su kA ba 'ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zab mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/  zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba/ 
132a10(1): de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ldang bzhugs te/ ma rmo zhing bzhes kyi sa de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das gag kya thub padi ltar gnas pa kris shes pa 'am gan ma bzhin cu bsu'o// 
132a11(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'das pan byang phyogs kyi logs gang 'ga'i klung bye ma snyed drug gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa 'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba de na/ de gzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
132b1(1): rgyas spos kyo mtsho' ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te mcho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de ya/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya rngub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris zhig pa 'ang gong ma bzhin du bsu'o// sangs rgyas kyi ning
132b2(1): 'di nas/ byang phyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
132b3(1): rgyas rdo rje'i mchog bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtshol zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das gag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsku'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas byang rgya
132b4(1): logs su gang 'ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma myed pa'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma myed pa'i mchog ces

132b6(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla bcan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i mchog ces bya ba da ltang bzhugs te/ mcho zhing bzhes
132b7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams nyi ma sha dang pakra zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzob sa ba'i sangs rgyas gdugs dpal zhes bya ba ga dkrung bzhugs te/ mtho zhing bzhes
132b8(1): kyis / de bzhin gshegs 'de la bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub 'ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa 'ang gong ma bzhin tu bkru'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klung kyi byem snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
132b9(1): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro mchog dam pa zhes bya ba/ da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshol zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshes
132b10(1): ba de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ni ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar phyogs su/ 'gang 'ga' klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ca lag mcho'

133a4(1): thub la rdzi stan gnas pa 'ang drig shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar phyogs logs su ka gang 'ga' klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba de na/

133a6(1): ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas ga zharaphyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma srid kyi 'jig rtenakyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang phan pa zhes bya ba #
133a7(1): de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsholazhing bzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag
133a8(1): kye thub pa// ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su/ ka 'ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams a ka rung dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba na/ 
133a9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa dka' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ka nu'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtshol zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas
133a10(1): kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar phyogs logs su ganga' ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phye mas bsgom pa zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
133a11(1): phye ma'i smos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtshol zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yabacom ldan 'das kaka kya thub pa/ sri ltar gnas la dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar phyog pa logs su/ gang lag
133b1(1): krung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khags 'das pa da/  'jig rten gyi khams skar ma zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skang sa'i 'od ces bya ba da kar bzhags te/ 'tshong zhing
133b2(1): lanas kyib/ de bzhi gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das gas kyi sgrub pa ji lar gnas pa dris shis// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas//  phyogs logs su/ kang 'da'i glang dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi lam ga 'das pa da
133b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal tsha'i sbyin zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing banas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
133b4(1): 'das nag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ gsangs rgyam kyi zhing 'di nas/  shang phyogs sogs su gang 'da'i klung bcu'i bye ma zhed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams krung dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de banin
133b5(1): gshegs par bu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyu'i snying po rang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mchol zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de la/ ji ltar gnas pa
133b6(1): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sgo phyogs logs su/  / gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ ge 'jig rten gyi khams 'tshas can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar garAny+dza ny+tsa tu
133b7(1): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klur gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
133b8(1): g.yang dag pa na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'alha'i sbyin zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho' zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ na pa phyogs sogs su
133b9(1): zhang 'bras krung gsum gyi bye ma nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun du bzang po zhes bya ba der/ de bzhin gshegs par dbu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhi
134a1(1): gagyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mchol zhing bzhes kyis/  bzhin gshegs pade la 'acom nan rnas
134a2(1): shag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ nub phyogs logs su gang 'ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
134a3(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mcho' zhing bzhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa /  ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ 
134a4(1): nub phyogs logs su/ gang 'ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pazang po can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa 'ang po zhes
134a5(1): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtshol zhing la zhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de nub phyogs logs su gang 'am
134a6(1): klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams dmyig gi bdag po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomagayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmyig gi rgyal po zhes
134a7(1): kya sa zhug te/ tsho 'ding bzhes kyis/ de bzhin nigs ni na com ldanas sagag kya nus pa rji ga gnas pa nas shig/ yang sa rgyas kyi sa nub phyogs sogs na/ gang 'ga' drang rgyan kyi byem se
134a8(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ko'i las sa'i snying po zhes bya ba daltar bdug pa te/ mtshol zhing bzhes
134a9(1): kyis/ de bani gshegs pa dal 'tsham ldan 'as / gag tu thub pa ji skang gnas pa dz+rag shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzin sa dung phyogs sogs su/ ga da'i thung dadu 'byes zhid tu 'jig rted gyi mas 'dam na/ 
134a10(1): 'jig rten gyi la ya smanas kya da /  bzhi dgasas dam pa mdun par rdzog ra dbyangs nas bya ba na te/ ma sanas rna ga /  'das
134a11(1): gag kya nub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shika/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs sogs su gang bka'i klud bcu bye ma snyed kyi 'jog rten gyi khams 'das 'an/ 'jig rten gyi thams ldan bsug pa zhes bya ba de na
134b1(1): bcom na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ba bcoms dag pan ga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsug pa'i mchon ces bya bar skar bzhugs te/ mtshol dang bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das gas kya kha brji
134b2(1): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas bya zhing di nas nub/ byang ga phyogs 'tshams logs su/ gapa' gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das par/ 'jig rten gyi 'angs dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhi gzhenas
134b3(1): gra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bangs rgya dgang mi gakyil pa nas bya ba dkar 'gas/ mtsha' dang zhes kyi/ de bzhan gshegs pa des/ som ldan 'asags zab padzis gnas cwas gan/  byu kyi
134b4(1): 'din/ nub byang phyogs 'tshams logs su/ gapa'aga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten kye khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes sdu ga ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes
134b5(1): pa zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te/ mcho ning bzhes kying// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das gas kya rub pa thi la sa gnas pa dris zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi dridri 'di na sa nub kyang phyogs marnams sogs su gang 'da'i bung ga bye ma rnyed
134b6(1): byab ga bzhin gshegs pa de yang bcom san 'das gag kya nub pa ji snyed rje te/ gnas pa dris shig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ding sanub byang gi khyon pas tsham pa logs su/ gang 'ad drung can khyim ste kyi
134b7(1): drang / 'dzi tu bya'am la rnas pa da 'jig ter gyi 'ams myongs 'ad khyod mabya den/ de ba gagags par gra com pa sa da dzigasasas rgyas gyon po mchog ces bya ba rnamug /  can kyi

137b8(1): bye ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'o sangs rgyas ku mu ta'i snying po zhes bya ba nid la bzhugs te/ mtshol zhing ba nas kyis/ de bzhid gshegs pa des/ bcom ldan 'das zhag kyi rdub /

137b10(1): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ka'i spos zhes bya ba da ltang bzhugs te// sa tsho'i zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das zhag kya thub pa rdo ltar gnas pa dris zhig/ 
137b11(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas seng gi phyogs logs su/ gang 'ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pad/ 'jig rten gyi khams so gang saM ka zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
138a1(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kra shis thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho' zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de lags bcom ldan 'das zhag kya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/

138a7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams shings dkar zhes bya ba den/ de banod gsheg sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa da mye tog drung zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ldog gi phyogs logs/

138a11(1): 'jig rten gyi 'ams dam mkha'i dbyings 'byung gnas dpe'i bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma ka'i dbyibs rtse so zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs sogs su/

145b2(1): dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa/ gzhan yang yod do// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang / sa dang / rgya mtsho 'a chen por bcas te/ bdag gi phrag pa la thogs nas/ lo skye

145b4(1): so/ bka' sam lang pa/ de ni stobs dang ldan pa ma yin/ dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad rtul phra mo'i chags kyis lo bye ba dang / bskal da pra mang por phyags te/ ba glang gi rjes kyi chu tsam du byed nus shing
145b5(1): sa dang / ri rab dang / chu bo dang / rgya mchor bcas te/ bskal pa mang por khur khyer nus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyas na/ nas dam pa'i chos lo brgyad bcu'i bar rtsa gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ skye bo phal pos kyang dam pa'i chos ston du myi nus

145b8(1): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad tu zhe na/ rgya mtsho'i chab kyis kyang me de zhi bar myi nus te/ 'byor ba'i chab kyis ni khyim rab tu 'bar ba la yang zhi bar myi nus na/ spyod gsum gyi stod chen po ga la nus/ bka'
