149b4(1): la rol pa spangs so// sor mo'i phreng bsakyang gsol de pa lA dang myi mang po nges par des lhung pa'i chos su mkhyen nas
149b5(1): 'dod pa'i 'du shes spangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas ba pa sor ma brid pasa'idi skadas med cig
149b6(1): o kA shis par gyur da cig/ lhag chad byed par bgyis chod lags pa/ ldag cham mchis na bla ma dang chos spyong mgon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang
150a1(1): ldan 'das kyis dmalam na pa/ de ni 'ag rten gzhan stsal pa'i byed/ slu ba'i byabs sa dang te// 'di sa 'o/ rgyal ba'i cad ces lkugs ba tsugs te/ rab kyas das la kyi nas
150a2(1): ba'i tshul gyis skugs stong phrogs par ston pas/ rgyal po dang 'khor thams cad dga' byed na/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis de'i bye brag byi shes so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thabs byas
150a3(1): te/ yab yum dang bdag nyid skyes bu brtan po stond te/ de nas phyis 'gro ba mang po yang srid pa'i 'tshol gyi zad pa las sgrol na/ sems can gyis de'i bye brag phyi zhes so// 'di lta ste/ rol mo la 'dus la yin
150a4(1): skyes bu ga kham gar byed cing/ gang dang gtam gyi tshigs su skyes pa dang 8/ bud byed dang / ma ning tu rgyudad te/ 'gro ba mang po myur bgul par byed par byed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
150a5(1): dbus su sbrum byed pas/ bdag nyid rnam pa mang por gcod cing /  bas 'gro mang po dga' bar byas pa yang snang ba 'am log pa'ang byed do// de bzhin du spru ma byed pa ltar// bdag nyid sems can mang po la khyen
150a6(1): thar bya ba lo phyir/ bdag nyid smra ba 'ald pa spyond to// yab 'jas dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mi thams cad khyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dpa ldan 'as/ 'jig rten kun tu legs pas rab tu gzigs sa/ 
150a7(1): thogs byed pa tshun chad khor ba ma'i long zhing / 'khyam pa na/ mar ma gyur pa byed/ sring po ma gyu rad pa byed do//  yang chub ma gyur dang/ phrams pa 'gru rang pa yas bram 'dra gyur pa te/ tshe rab
150a8(1): bye ba mang por 'chol ba'i 'jig rten ni gar khan bzhin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pas spyod pa mdzad rdo// gzhas yapa' jam dpal rang gi dbyings/ lhan cig tu 'dod pa 'i me po byas pa las
150b1(1): cung zad pa del pa nga gis bzung ste/ smras pa de bzhin tu 'gyur ro// / bdag nyid ma nibastesnyan ba de ba de dang / 
150b2(1): sug la gyi phul po 'byung // thu gyenas ya bzhin 'ashegs pa ma ma pa / dru
150b3(1): pa yang de bzhin no// bdag nyid kyis bzung nas bzhin rgya 'i chus par gyur ras/ de'i phyir sems can zas cas kyi dbyings ni/ dbyigs gcig go// tshangs par spyod pa lamams te/ bdag nyid gzhan sa
150b4(1): 'gyur pa yig bya de bzhin gshegs pa phyis to/ 'jab dpal gyis gsold la/ ji'i sra kya/ de bzhis gshegs pas dgel spes pa dang / dges snyen thams cad tshangs par pyod pa ya ba tus pa 'ong / ji'i srad tu dgel
150b5(1): snyem dang/ dge'i snyen ma dang/ dgel slob dang / dge la slob ma rnams ni ka pa bzhi pa'i khab pa lta bus dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dpel bstan nas/ sdig pa chen po yab rab tu 'byung bar gdal ste/ ji'i slad du/ dge snyen dang / dge
150b6(1): sbyin ma dag de la pa sdig pa rab tu gdal bar gyur na/ ngi'i slad tu ya dges snyen dang / dge' snyen pa rnams kyi 'brel ba'i chos bcas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' banal das/ 'jas dpal de ni rgya shes phyi
150b7(1): byabatags so// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams ca sangs rgyas kyi gnas la bkod kyis/  gcas 'dzin kyi tshul bya/ dzinan pa bgyi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi 'a shes pa // 'jig rten
150b8(1): gi 'dra shes kyang tha dad de/ 'brib 'di ni myi 'dri ba zhes 'ba'o// 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings kyi yin pas ma/ srog cod pa sngomapa ni/ sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi grwa 'i lca pa bdag gsod pa lham
150b9(1): 'jig rten na srog gcod pa yang de bzhin te/ bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'jom pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis gso yang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji li slad rtsa/ sgra gcan dzi nad bzhin tu mtshungs par gzigs la bdag nyid kyi dbyis
150b10(1): 'chab pa/ spyod chags pa'i nyil mtshan can rnams cad pas cad cing/ bsad lam pa stand/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de sad ma zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgra gcan 'dzind dang mtshus
150b11(1): bar gzigs so/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal skyes bu chos 'dod pa zhig bdag nyid su wa ba las pa/ rdo la la zhig gis gsund te/ zas lan cig par gyur da na/ srin bu'i rigs rgyad bcu li gsod par 'gyur te/ ji ste de ltar
151a1(1): nams de ltar gyur na /  bdag gsod pa 'i sems skyed cing gzhin gyi rlung rgya gnas te// bdag 'dod pa'i sems skyes na/ de'i phyir bya zhes pa ner cig/ delas ngo tsha ba skye bar 'gyur rdzo/ nga'i thus gcig yod kyang zug / 
151a2(1): lcang bcug las bdagag sod sa ni/ bdag gi khams 'jom par 'gyur rab/ de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de rnam pa garnams kyi drang po na/ de bzhin 'jas dpal sags pa/ 'a 'di ga bdag gas /  kyi
151a3(1): zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te/ gzhan gsod par ni gyi 'gyur ro sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig ni spyod chags pa'i yam mtshan cad dam kha'i chos 'dzin pa rnams bdag gi nyon mongs pa myi zad pa ltar de dag myed par/ 
151a4(1): byed cing tshul ma yin par gnod pa 'ang byed du 'jug ste// ded// ga ni bdag la mchod pa yin no// ji ltar bdag sdug pas 'dod/ men pa dang / bde ba dang / zas dang / srog 'dod pa de bzhin tu / bdag
151a5(1): spong bar 'dod pas ston chags pa'i yam tshas can rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snying po rig pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa ji de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i skad rtsa/ 
151a6(1): sangs rgyas rnams sha gyi gsol 'amabacom ldan 'das kyis bkal bas ma khad pa/ 'jam dpal zhi nad tu de bzhin te// thog ma myed pa 'i 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs de dag la sems can thams pa ar ma gyur pa dang / 
151a7(1): sring mo ngam gyur da pa yang byed do// khyim gyur da la yang phan gyur da te/ 'chol ba'i 'jig rten no tshwa ma khas bzhin no// de bas na bdag gigan/ gzhan gyi ma na cig pa// yin las sangs rgyas rnams ga byin chos
151a8(1): gzhan yang 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings te/ dbyings gcig tu gyurd pa'i sha za bar 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas rnams sha myi gsol lo// 'jam 'dapal gyis gsol dpa/ spang ci dang / 
151b1(1): sangs rgyas ni ma pa'i byed pa yin/ chags pa'i ngas rigs 'an na/ pade mi gnas ma yin te/ mang mings pasnyen pananams kyi chos nyid do/ mas cig nas gnas kyi
151b2(1): papa byed de/ rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang de bsnyend par gyi byal// gso pa'i yas lag pa yin pas gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bstan tu chung // bcig nas gcig tu mchis pa'o/ 
151b3(1): shes/ sas 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa gal te sa ste dra chos bzhin rgya gum nas/ tshong rdzas gcig nr-i/ rnam mkhas kyis ko ga las lnga ba chubs ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
151b4(1): sa bdas pa ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la stsol na gcig nas na gcig tu mchis pa zhes sas// 'jas dpal gyis gsoso/ smreb ga te ma serang chos bzhin tu bus nas/ sa ge'i bdas
151b5(1): mo nango la pa khas ko ga blangs te/ las mkhan dam lad nas yum rgya d+habs te/ tshul khrims dpaldan pa las yang nas/ de gtsig nas gcig tu mchis pa sags pa pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b6(1): bka' stsal dpa ma de chos bzhin tu shi bar gyur pa/ ma he bdag pos slab drug tu bcug nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byind nas/ blan par bya'am 'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang mthun nas si
151b7(1): rje byed pa yin te/  tshul khrims paral bar gyi 'gyur ba ma yin no/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol na mos kol yab bgyid gyi 'gyur ro/ chu mi gtsang bas bcos pa'i zas kyang kyi blang ngo // de lta la gas dang / dge slo
151b8(1): dag de lta bu gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsa la pa// de ni 'jig rten gyi 'argya shes shes bya ste/ gal te dge snyen yod na ni/ thus dang stsol u gtsang ba spyod cig/ gang ni dge bsnyen da yod par ros rko kyi
151b9(1): yang na dpe bsnyen byed pa bsangs rgyas nas/ de sa byam sa na ga chags son/ chog nang sa sno chags yod/ rnam pa' lam thogs med/ ga' d+hede sa nas yang dag pa zu pa nas
152a1(1): can gdag na la las gyi gnas sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phagalas stsa na gang 'jig rten pa sa sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang / mthun pa yod pa shes thabs gas bams nas ma rgyas kyi segs su sa bya'o// 
152a2(1): dpal 'jig rten pa rnams kyang b.rad pa brjod do// de dag la tha dad pa byed kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tha dad pa yod do// de dag la yang rab tu byung ba yod do// de dag gi rab tu 'thung gas yin gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi
152a3(1): bstand pa la ni chas tu 'brung ba yod da / 'jig rten pa la yang ga za ba ni bdag nyid pa'o zhes rjod do/ de yang bdag nyid kyi gas kyi dge/ bcos ldan 'das kyi bstan pas nA~M/ bdag nyid kyi 'phu nges sor yang sa 'das
152a4(1): 'jig rten tham mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo'o sde 'di las bstan dpa/  can 'dodod sa gsol pa bcog gnas 'das byas 'tshas ma bcob 'an 'das kyi su bka' ba 'das 'angs dpa yin 'das pa tho
152a5(1): pa rko yan da bzang po zhes bya la/ 'jig rten tu gro ba 'dir byung ste/ de'i tshe ya cha mtshan can myed cing / mtshan can gyi mying yang myed do// sems can theg chen po khar gyur te/ sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur/ 
152a6(1): ho/ de'i tshe de'i 'ang+yas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo ma par+ya bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan yas 'das so// yongasu mya ngam las 'das pa'i bstand pa yang lo mang tu gnas nas/ dam kha'i chos
152a7(1): chub par gyu dad pa'i tshedage slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i chus na/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba/ zhig 'gond pa na gnas te/ dge' slong des sems can
152a8(1): dge ba'im pa dang ldan pa cig gis rin tha byed pa'i gos byin nas / dge slong des rjes su gzung ba'i phyir blangs te// rus shan 'ad ling bzhi zlab nas/ oM bstan te/ song ba 'ang a shan 'da'i gyis gos rje la mthong nas gang ses
152b1(1): gazlog se/ nub mo sun khu na/ dgel slong de'i thad tu song ste/ gos de phrogs nas/ ri khrod du khrid de/ gces du byung nas/ shis la lag pa gyen tu rnam par 'chings te/ sa ba / de'i nug po mun ku na kye tog thug pa'i
152b2(1): bram ze smon pa thog te/ 'brog 'gon la'u 'ongs nas/ nam yongs te/ tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na sug bcug pas spag/ stag zhes bsad la thug lnga dag cig tha tu bros te ga bdag nyid rab tu gyi dag lazhi song nas dge' slo
152b3(1): gcer bu bcings nas/ kye ma dge sbyong 'gon pa pa/ cur smrig cas 'dir 'ongs/ cang smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni/ thard par gyi 'gyur ba lta zhig rnyas ste lag pa bsgrengs nas lus gcer bur byung la kha ka' thub su par
152b4(1): snyam nas lam 'di nges par tha dad pa'i lam tu legs par grub pa yin nas zhes/ dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i phyir de/ bdag gi gos ngan pa po rad te/ skrag btogs nas mgol ba bo gcer bu kha'i dge sbyong du gyur da te de la dge sbyong
152b5(1): gcer bu pa byung ngo po// dge sbyong gcer bu nyid bcings pa khrol nas shing shun blangs te/ sa ser pos byugs nas/ thabal 'gro ba bramame zhig gis bathong nas sngar ba shad pa bzhin tu mthong nas/ snga ba bshad pa bzhin
152b6(1): bya mthong ba dang / de ni cung smrig gyon pa'i dge sbyong ste/ rtsung sbyinabor nas btsag gyis byugs te/ song nas tha rad pa'i las ni/ ge 'di yin su ba ste/ 'di ni dge bam 'gro la 'am ji zhe 'di kun tu sgyu rgyar te/ 
152b7(1): de las su rgyags tu skyab byung ngo // dge 'a slong bre chung zhugs te/ ras gi klad pa'i bar rgyas bkrus nas/ swa 'jam khos grang ba'i rmi g.yogs ste/ sprul ba sad pa'i ras pa lang jis bor ba gyon te khyus thon
152b8(1): ba de/ skyes bu shi nad tu gzhan zhig gis mthong ste/ snga ma ltar dge' slob de nyon mongs pa'i mthong nas dge la spyod de nyon mongs pa'i mthong nas dge slo di ni byang smrig gyon da te rgyal ma tshang rgyang sdig gis
152b9(1): tha da par gyi 'gyur na/ pas thabasams nas/ rayang sa ni babor bar byas te/  sos rlon/ ces gsus rgya khrus byed pa ni/ bkra 'a bru'i spyod pa yin tu'i zung dang de ge pa yin nas zhes 'di thad 'phelas
152b10(1): ste / gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can tu gyur te/ de tshun chad ya mtshan can bka' thub byed pa 'byung ngo // dge sbyong de chur gzhugs te/ tha mang po thams cad la rnag gis/ ka yog ste garang gi lus rtul gyi
153a1(1): gang ni rnam pa 'argyazhi dade slo na 'dam thag yogs pa thodan/ su jug spyod pa dang / byugs 'dag nams des gyu ma/ dge slong dag sa 'i srim ma shesa'i rtsogs te/ rba
153a2(1): rgyan ma na ga na// nas masringa'i ma pa rtenas rgyangs@ lta la// rtse su ca ce pa na
153a3(1): rtsa 'gro bar gyurd to// de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu cha drug gi lta bar gyur da pa rnams kyang / so so nas der lpags te/ dge slong de dang ji ltar mthong nas/ log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang / rtsa brtags
153a4(1): so/ 'di lta ste dper na/ phan tshun tu ri dgas su mthong nas da ri dgas bsad snyam du bsams te/ gcig la cig gsod pa de bzhin tu ya mtshan can dgu bcu la ca dgu yang de ltar 'byung ngo // 
153a5(1): dper na byam spa ba sa rigs rnapas smig rtsub la chu yin pa sabasams te/ 'chi bar 'gyum pa de bzhin na/ da na chos nub par 'gyur ba'i byas na/ dge slong gi gnyis sa gzhan#
153a6(1): du gyur da te/ 'jam dpal de lta 'jig rten pa'i tshul khribs dang spyod ye dang / bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i byis na/ de lta bu byangan
153a7(1): chos nub par 'gyur ro// 'jas dpal de bzhin tu bdag gi de kho na ni 'di 'dra/ de 'dra'o zhes skrag par lta ba bzhin tu 'di lta ste/ tha dad pa dang / bdag dang / 'jig rter las bye yang ldem po dag phyi shes pas
153a8(1): das kyi nanas kyis byu cog na// sa ca sa rgyas pa'i 'di rten pas yang ga na chos byed pa ma dang /  tena'adas pas ma rna
153a9(1): dag tu bshad pa kyi shes pas / shes banyams te dani phyir phyogs gnyis gangs te te/ bdag su gtogs pa'i chos kyi de 'don nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge btsun gyi de bzhin nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153b1(1): bsa' thob pa bcom ldan nas byon sa gsum dam rjem 'ad+mo pa'i yin 'byung ba dang / 'dod sum yin 'byung babad tugs sa tsugs ga nga sems pan gsas 'das pan par 'gyur pasod pas de bzhin gshes sa sa
153b2(1): gtan mab/ ma ldan das kyis paka' rgya dpa mdzas pa khrigs kyi dbus pani ma sa la spyod pa'i sems kyi rgya sang zag cu sa can 'byung /  ci byes na rgyun chu chu
153b3(1): nang phyogs su 'dol sde la spyod pa byel ba stong dgu bcu sa rgyad 'byung ngo / nga 'dod chen pa bye ba khrag drug brgya 'byung po// gang nub phyogs su mdol sdel za rnga spod pa bye ba phrag dgu brgya tha dgu 'byung ngo / 'dod chen pa bye ba khrag sa
153b4(1): babru 'byung ngo// lho phyogs su mdo sde la spod pa bye ba phrag dgu brgyal ba / rgyan 'byung ngo po/ 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi 'i bcu la 'byung ngo // / kha tse yul bya yang nga'i bstan sa la khregs lam/ lhag pa'i brjod dpa
153b5(1): na gca pa sa'i rnags pas lagasas ma bgyur /  de bzhi so// sems byi gi rnams bsrud pa nis kyigs sa/ da can bamamam
153b6(1): skrong+ga la 'byung ste/ ba la sdu dad pa de la ji ltar bya zhes pa yang rngo cha pa skye'o// lha phyogs pa'i rgyud tu theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te/ nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa spyod pa/ dngos pa chen po brgyad dang bral
154a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dzem dpal de bzhin te/ lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo dum zhig gnas par 'gyur ro// khyod wA bu shin tu dga' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpang / 
154a2(1): rnams rang gi srog bzud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa bre zug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsung drung ngo zhes sems can thams cad la dun pa bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston/ 
154a3(1): kyang bskal pa bye ba mang por nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ nam dam pa'i chos la brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer bar mi 'dod do// yang 'jam dpa' khyod lta bu'i dam pa'i
154a4(1): chos lo brgyad chu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa ni chos kyi khur chen po byer te/ bdag gis dang pani chos phrags bskur rosas nas/ dzan+da gling dang / gling bran thams cad kyi sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i Tu
154a5(1): te snying po rtag pa ther zug zhi ba/ g.yung drung yin no zhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste rab tu bstan par bya'o// sems can rnams yid ches kyang rung / mi ches kyang rung / nga'i lus bsad dam/ nga'i lus ma bsad kyang rung gdod pa
154a6(1): dag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te/ khur khyer ba rab tu dga' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas 'byung ngo // nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dang / khyod la sogs pa seMs can bye ba mang po yod de de'i phyir lho phyog
154a7(1): de kyi rgyudang rab tu bsngags so// nga'i chos tha ma der ston par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid kyis dzam+bu gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzem pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyus nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro// 
154a8(1): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyi khrims byas pa thos na/ bdag nyid kyang skye dgu sbyong ba de bzhin du kha cha'i yul gyi 'bor dang / yul b+ha ru gtsab rnams kyang ngo tsha ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing sgeg sa
154b1(1): sa / ma ldas gan rjes nga shi sus / [] sa rdzun pa nga sa
154b2(1): kyis bkar yul pa/ ga shig mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam pa'i wang na ma ya pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/ shog ga mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ u dubA ra'i me tog bzhin do// de nas dbang po'i bu thu bo mngon du jos
154b3(1): zhes bya ba sdug bdaga' ba ying du 'ong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nangs la mgo 'os phyag batshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gi 'am l+h+wam min dang thub pa 'i/ kha lo sgyur babs pa 'dzin zhes kyi 6
154b4(1): ba la/ lha rnams 'phel ba dang / lha ma yin pham par 'gyur ba de ltar shing rta drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / lha gzhan du ma dgongs shig/ bdag ni sngar 'gum ste/ khyod ni slad kyis so// grub kyang rung / ma grub kyang rung / bdag gi srog kyang bor/ gzhan
154b5(1): dang mdza' ba'ang spangs nas go cha chen po bgos pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos lo brgya cu'i bar du gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gzhigs pa rtag pa nyid
154b6(1): dang / rjer chug nyid dang / gsung drung nyid du de bzhin gshegs
155a1(1): ma mapa pa da bral sa/ dathab d-i l+h+wa sa smye / 'dun gshegs pa'i mam pa stan par grub / da pa'i kyi can pa su kyilas sa kyi
155a2(1): 'dzin te tu rgyas par 'gyur pa zhes de/ bdag #dashin thong ni rgyas kyis bdun te/ dpa pas
155a3(1): mang po dang / zung byed dpa kA bum dang / snga gzhan dang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la nom thos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang thos kyang dga'i blang 'i tshul dang / dge slo
155a4(1): ma tshul dang /  gyen gyi rgyal dang dge zhen pa'i 'dag la de dag bsrung bar bya'o// denag gi sa kyang rtag tu 'dab kyi gnas so byed rnapas denas byam
155a5(1): blon po dang dmas khon la smoms dpung 'i thogs yang lag bzhi dang / lhan cig do sa/ phyi'i gzugs su srin po/ phyi gnyis stong tsa macig gis mchang bam pa dade / za po'i 'dres bya
155a6(1): khrag gis bskus shing stobs dang / phal chen por rab tu mkhyem zhing grong khyer 'di nas gnas pa'i dgongs bzhi bcu tsam na 'dug cing badrag gi ma dang der gsad de/ myi gnyis stong du tshang pa bya'o// snyam nas / de rab tu
155a7(1): dga'o zhes grag gis/ mtshungs pa zhig dzinagacas mo 'di bas nagadong bdag cag glong dang grong khyer dang khyab pas gnas na dmas kyi thams cad kyang rang kyi khyim nas 'byung / de bsan

161a6(1): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu byung ba de dgra gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas
161a7(1): ces gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa sang sa rgyas kyi rgyas thams can rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i bka' stsal parnam pa dmed pa yang dag paji sdug
161a8(1): med pa da mirig pa dang / kyang nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu gas kyisamanas dang 'dugs ce gdus rgyur zer phyi mishes kyi ming de 'dzin dang / 'ad bzhin gyi lum gings dang / 
161a9(1): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gis brgyan pa/ gsapa med pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang / kis dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / @
161b1(1): dang / b+hu ru dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / mtshal dang / mgo nag gi 'bru dang / king+ku ka dang / in+d+ra go pa dang / gser dang / tsam+ba ka dang / pad+mo dang / dung dang / 
161b2(1): rma bya'i mgul dang / mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu thob nas sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar byin pa
161b3(1): bcu'i bsngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag
161b4(1): pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas byug
161b5(1): btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gci ga cig bcom
161b6(1): ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
161b7(1): bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar
161b8(1): byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar spos shig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs
161b9(1): nga dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di ska ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug po 'ang jig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'dun ma med da'i sas
161b10(1): chen las 'das te gnasasas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing sug bo bar nig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 
162a1(1): 'du zhes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma tshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu 'di nas par la shin pa rol dngas rgyas kyi zhing bya ba stong rma/ 
162a2(1): brgyu 'das pa'i sbrang gi phyogs chan tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du ska la'i dbang po'i rgya po de bzhin gzigs pa po/ 
162a3(1): ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
162a4(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brtsan pa shin tu spangs
162a5(1): shing che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dag de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis
162a6(1): rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dngang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
162a7(1): mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'dug par ston te/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/ de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
162a8(1): bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de'i lan du ngas 'di smras so// rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa
162a9(1): khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems par ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162a10(1): chen po shugs 'dzin 'di'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang spyi gtsug tshad med pa la ltad mo blta bar
162b1(1): 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gad+hA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs
162b2(1): 'dzin 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug tshad med pa'ang ma mthong ste/ des ma mthong ba dang / 
162b3(1): ngo mtshar du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug ltar tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid
162b4(1): du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes te mngon par bstod nas/ 
162b5(1): bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song ste gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
162b6(1): chen po rdo rje'i snying pos dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa tho ba dang dmigs su phebs pa dang / rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa sbyin las langs te bla gas phrag pa gcig tugazar nas
162b7(1): lus stsogasan pa'i skangs la btsugs / bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de shAb po ba phyug sa nabacom ldan 'dis la 'du nad ces gso / bcom ldan 'dus
162b8(1): ma ngas kyis paka dbus pa/ rdo rje'i skong po khyod kyis de 'i gshegs pa gru bcom tha la dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la jig cig dang / 'das kyidang ci 'dod pad da
162b9(1): dri ba dris palung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can po rdo rje'i
163a1(1): snying po la bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs be nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsor/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bkyi
163a2(1): kA ba dang / 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar
163a3(1): byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang / gzugs dang mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i
163a4(1): blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang / gces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / 
163a5(1): kyil mdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba nams kyi rnam par bzlog 'di mad du bshang du gsog/ 'ad ba gzhags pabastan du mamos/ mchog pa dang / srid pa dang / las dang / mig dang / 
163a6(1): gzugs dang / snang ba dang / de la skye ba'i yidadi la byed pa dang / gisus 'dra ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang / khyu dang / de zag pa dang / dbang dang
163a7(1): rkyen las byung ba'i pa shes pa chags pa rgyu nga / 'od 'i dang / me 'dushA di rtog / chom 'di bdi dung bdang/ 
163a8(1): nyid du nu byung ba rnangs kyi'ang thonam par 'artog pa'i spyad du bcom ldan 'das bzhin du nas na/ ma kya bang po thob bar 'gyu kyim pa bar gshegs pa kun du mol/ 
163a9(1): rnam ces sde ma skyel sogs mngar bdagada' 'as gtigs gsangs rgyas blo dang zhes bya dang // des dgang gis 'thang kyang/ shes byarnamapa
163b1(1): lnga po nams// thugs su chung ba sangs rgyas te// chos rnams thams cad sa khyen pas na/ mya ngan 'das dang mnyam gshegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// 
163b2(1): dge'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying pos bcu la dbang ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed pa dge'o// 
163b3(1): rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ba/ sangs rgyas dang 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' zhig ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang
163b4(1): don 'di la ltad mo byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig don 'di ci zhig/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'am 'on te gzugs las
163b5(1): gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang byi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang
163b6(1): 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir shes rab dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul te/ 
163b7(1): mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo/ kye rgyal ba'i bu
163b8(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu de bas na dge bar shin tu nyon te yid la gyis shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes
163b9(1): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po
164a1(1): ting de ya bang ba de rje zhing po rlung po nam pa ni de bzhin gshegs ma na/ dung po las gzhan yang rnyed de/ rlung po la gan mas/ 
164a2(1): po'ang gnasas mas skye ba dang 'jig pa'ang gnanam yin/ shes par bya ba'angs min gas pa'ang mdzin/ don kya ma yin/ dbang pon nas kya ma 'an
164a3(1): phyir zhes phung po dang / khams dadu/  mched dang / yus rnams ni mno ba sam med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di nam su las nang ngam phying 'du mebs mo
164a4(1): gzugs na spyod pa mad cang sems med pa te/ 'thung bskyed panachos can/ mtha 'dag pa/ chu dang shing dang zong da dang 'dzag/ shin tu da'i dul gyi chog da ba dang po
164a5(1): chongs ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar smra'o// 'du shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de'ang gnyis las skyes pa'i smig rgyu dang 'dra ba
164a6(1): ste/ dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyan cing chu 'tshol ba rnams la chu ri rmongs par byas rnas@
164a7(1): byed do// de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/ de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes pa/ dpyod pa rnams kyis brjod pa las
164a8(1): logs shig tu mi dmigs pa/ bong bu'i rwa dang / mo gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad pa ste/ rmi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o// dper na rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba sad pa'i
164a9(1): tshe gzugs la sogs pa dang / bud med bzang mo'ang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du mi shis pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba'ang mngon par sangs rgyam na mi dmigs so// 'du byed nams
164b1(1): ni chu shing gi snying po sa bu ste brtsal na/ lus dang ngag dang 'ad las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid de
164b2(1): pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa 'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan du rtsa dang shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / mi dang / 
164b3(1): rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams ma yin gyi bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'ang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug
164b4(1): lang rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtog ste de'ang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go// de bzhin
164b5(1): ngagashegs pa ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/ sangs rgyus rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i rnab 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das da'i dbyings 616
164b6(1): dang / nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin
164b7(1): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid po 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes
164b8(1): bya ba ni'ang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang 'jug go// skyon med par 'da' ba ni byang chub sems dpas spang
164b9(1): bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du myos te/ sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da'
165a1(1): rang sangs rgyas su 'dus byed pa'i lum du 'thob/ tI 'dzin gyi 'angam dri thad na chen po 'ang bar rnam par rdzogs kyi rnam yin pa'i sum ga nas ngas spang rgyas kyi sgyu sa
165a2(1): ldan nas mi na shing rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur bas rgya dun duni mi rnam padag mi 'asgrub par gnas par bya'o// des sa sa kyi su risasu
165a3(1): shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa/ sprul pa'i yul can/ de bzhin ni shegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor bas brgyad pa pas dzin
165a4(1): pa/ chos kyi sprin gyis la shes pa rab tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyis zhugs te/ thams cad du 'grong ma
165a5(1): gyur pa/ yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin can/ stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la spyod pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu bo zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i don mo/ 
165a6(1): bad mi'i bdag po thams ca kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bar 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'di
165a7(1): pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas
165b1(1): zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i mthar thug par bsku ba grub pa'i sngags 'chang ltar mi snang zhing khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag sprul pa'i
165b2(1): 'od zer dang / 'phrul pas sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
165b3(1): bcad pa/ 'di dag gsungs so// dbang po phung po sprul yin te// sred dang ma rig las kyang yin// bag chags kyis bcings mi bzad pa// yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung // rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags rnams/ 
165b4(1): zhags pa sems bskyod de yin no// khro ba me lce mnyam pa ste// zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin// thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyis// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te// phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor can gyis
165b5(1): rnal 'byor spyod// gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te// phung po lhag ma gzugs med pa// ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang // grib la sdong dum la sogs med// mkha' la rlung gzugs mi sdang dang // bya yi rdzas rnams ji bzhin ni// mangs
165b6(1): pas so so rang rig pa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni// sangs rgyas dngos po mi snang ste// sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na// 
165b7(1): de ni bstan du mi nus pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste// yod dang med kyis rnam par spang // rdo ba phye mar btags pa la// gser ni yod par mi snang ste// sbyang ba'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gas ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin// gzugs rnams
165b8(1): rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag ma dang // khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang // rnam par shes dang dbang po dag/ gcig dang tha dad dngos po yang // rdul phral rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos por sa ng+yas yod pa min/ 
165b9(1): sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te// rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong // mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// gang na sdug bsngal de na bde// de nyid la ni snang ba yin// sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste// sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag
166a1(1): pa yod// rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can// rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste// 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 'di dag sangs rgyas lngar gsungs so// sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag
166a2(1): ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste// rnal 'byor can gyi thub pas mthong // khams rnams gsum po 'das pa dang // rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing / 
166a3(1): bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing // rgyal sras bzang pos kun tu gang // de ni thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs// mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes/ 
166a4(1): bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes shes byed la// stug po de na rnam par spyod// stug po de yi sems can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun// skad cig 'jig par shin tu 'das// ting nge 'dzin la rtag
166a5(1): / dag pa ldan nas dpa' 'phrul ba gang // rtog pa can nams thun rnams dzang // dug yon /  sa mang po// sang sa rgyagag rdzag ni stsagan pajugs/  tshogs nas dang gzugs rdzu te// 'ams pan pas pa gas
166a6(1): yis// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam bzhag pa// chu yi zla bzhin du snang // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni// tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par mdzes// thams cad chos la gzus
166a7(1): brnyan ltar// gcig dang tha dad spangs par te// dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni// skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyen// rdul las ma yin dus las min// dbang po las min gces las min// rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan
166a8(1): par rnam mdzes pa// rgyu yi tshul du sangs rgyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten sku la 'khod bya ste// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang // de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes// bya ba thams
166a9(1): cad phyi nang du// gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams// phyir yang phyag gi mthil bkod de// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'dzud pa// sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'// thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o// 'jig rten rnams la byed
166b1(1): pa med// sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// rab rib mi shes myos mdongs pa'i// rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i
166b2(1): rnams/ yod dang med pa'i smra bas bcom// 'on dam thams cad 'jig pa dang // cung zad 'jigasas smra ba rnams// 'di la med dam cung zad dam// bdag dang bdag med ga la yod// sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na// rnal 'byor/ 
166b3(1): mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams// ji ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten na// rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas rnams la smig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag/ bdeg la sogs pa'i las
166b4(1): rnams kyang // rlung ldan sogs pa'i theg pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen gyi mchog zhinasasdig rten sa chom ma dang / mi la 'khrul 'khor bskor ba ste// rgya mtsho'i skye ba 'dzin pa 'dra// stug po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan
166b5(1): las byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nge sa la btsugs te/ bcom
166b6(1): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a
166b7(1): mchos ma med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa song ba rnams dang / mnan med pa la gzhol ba rnams dang / ma dang ma la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / 
166b8(1): b.lang dang / dgu' pa 'gums pa'i sems san rnams ji mar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i thug bsngal las ji ltar 'ongs su dzum bar 'argyar/ bcom ldan 'das
166b9(1): khyim bkar stsas pa/ 'jamadapal sbyin dadaganyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'thor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin pas ni kye
167a1(1): ba dran par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo // chos kyi sbyin
167a2(1): bas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to// 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// 'jam
167a3(1): dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / 
167a4(1): mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yong sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga dag gam/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dag
167a5(1): gamana'aphags pa spong ba dag gam/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam/ bskal par gnas pa dag gam/ sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ 
167a6(1): tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung ngun lug gsod pa dag kyang rung / phyag dar ba'ang rung / sme sha can yang rung ste/ 'jam dpa' sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos sug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa #
167a7(1): dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / chung ngu na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang / su'ang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim gro
167a8(1): byed pa dang / nang bar langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang / lag pas rag par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
167a9(1): gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ ro 'am/ ro bam pa zhig yod la/ de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro// 
167a10(1): 'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas lho dpag tshad brgya stong mar skyes pa yod do// yi dgas de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngar
167b1(1): myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpa' sus mdo sde rin po che 'di ring gror byas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyam mtshan dang / lha'i bdan gyis mdzo
167b2(1): ba dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed nang 'od kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o// rlung ngun byom song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ribam bdur khrod na
167b3(1): 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang bya gzhan pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la
167b4(1): nam nur dang / the tshom dang yid gnyis mi bya'o// sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las yongs su mnyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na / 
167b5(1): snga rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro// mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i la'u ste gnyis pa'o// mtha' yas yul can shin tu pra// bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i
167b6(1): mchog dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa// chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs// bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams// kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin// yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni dris
167b7(1): medad/ blo dang shes bya bral ba ste// tshad dang dbang po spangs pa yin// sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin// de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul// mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste// de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang // chags can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad// mnyam par bzhag cing
167b8(1): gos pa med// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med min// chags med lam la gnas pa ste// lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang // dri za lha min mi 'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo// de la ngo mtshar sred pa med// 'gro ba gang nang g.yo ba med// sngon nas
167b9(1): dag gi'i rnal 'byor gyi// da ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis// mthong yang de dang 'di na med// ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni// dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam par tha dad mur 'dug
167b10(1): rnams dgang la gang gis dbang gyur pa// de la de lta'i chos ston te// rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis// rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing // rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshul dang ning
168a1(1): rnams kyi// phun sum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung khung rnam dag pa// lha yi lha yi mthu yis na// phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin// 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang // rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis// gang
168a2(1): rnams byed bzhug bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras su// da ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi// dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang // gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang // gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o// dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis// mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas// 'brog cing
168a3(1): sbyin dang 'brel pa dang // cod phan can dang lag na gzhur// dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na yang shin tu snang // rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin// ri dgas rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra// 'jig rten rnams
168a4(1): gyis rgyum la// ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i// rmi lam bzhin du bus pas mthong // khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu// mi sbyin gu yang tshangs pa dang // sa
168a5(1): nan ta dang sa nan 'da'// sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne co la sogs rnams bsam kyang // de yi yul la rnam par bslad// de dag rnal gyis mi mthong // thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa// de dag yul na gang yang min// lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i
168a6(1): phyir nas dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i// rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan// lha yi ltas ni byas pa yi// stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis// 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de// mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag/ dbyibs dang mdog dang 1ny+tsa hA
168a7(1): khyad par dag/ bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni// gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste// brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min// skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo// kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags// mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams
168a8(1): rjegos 'grub pa dag / mtshan nyid snganas mi rnyed de// 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o// das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med// rkyen du bya rnams med par yang / rtags pa'i dngos po gang yang med// rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la// dngos po yod par
168a9(1): yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur// yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang // med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin// pra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags// phung po rdza ras la sogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin// rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor ba drug dang bcas// rab tu
168a10(1): smra ba sum brgya yis// 'jug pa dag dang snang ba yin// mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba// skye ba med cing 'chi med par// slar sad nas su sems pa ni// bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no// ji ltar ri dang de rnams kyi// grib pa kun tu snang ba bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten rmi las yang // mabs pa
168b1(1): rnams ni de bzhin bsam// ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba zhig/ bud med lhan cig rtse dgar rmi// sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang // lha rab btsun mo mnyam pa dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos po de// sad nas rnam par sems pa ni// ci zhig bden nam rmi lam yin// rdzi lam bud med lhan
168b2(1): cig tu// rtses nas phyir ni bdag sad de// 'di brdzun bus pa slu ba yin// de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun// rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no// dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang // ma dang phu nu bo dag kyang // rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste// rnal 'byor sbyar ba bcis mi bya/ 
168b3(1): dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang // ri dang ri yi sman gshongs dang // 'o ma 'byung dang ma la ya// lhun po byin dang dbang chen dang // gangs kyi ri dang ke la sa// char 'bab dag la'ang gang gnas dang // dzam+bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang // gang dag bdud rtsi za ba dang // phan du kam
168b4(1): bal par ya dra// ko bi dar na gang 'khod dang // ri rab nang na gang gnas dang // bsam dpag shing la gang gnas dang // rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // tham cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di// gang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste/ 
168b5(1): pad+mo gnas su brtan bcas te// skyil mo krung du mnyam bzhig cing // rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis// 'dod dang bde las rnam par dben// dbang po dbang po'i don gyis rnams// thams cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing // lcags lus glang po ji bzhin du/ 
168b6(1): sem sa ni ma nyam par banag par gyos/ 'jig rten 'jig can 'das bsam gtan / gang 'ang de bzhini gagags pa'i dge / 'dod dang da' ba na lasogs/ dang nathams cad drugs pa dang / khyad par du yang gzugs med dang / 'du nas med pa'i mam can
168b7(1): gtan rnams// nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // 'du shes yod min med min rnams// nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs// pad+mo dang ni 'od 'dra zhing // nam mkha'i ri mo mo 'dra bar// rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong // 'di dag thams cad spangs nas su// snang ba
168b8(1): med par rab tu gnas// gang tsha mtshan med rnal 'byor can// rnam par mi rtog chags med na// sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong // zhing dang zhing na mnyam bzhag pa// de dag phyag gi dbang bskur bar// de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas sa la bzhugs pa dang // 
168b9(1): sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung // sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas// kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur// stobs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'thob// gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin// thams cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur// thub pa rnal 'byor/ 
168b10(1): skyed pa'i yang // gzugs ni rdul du nam gzigs shing // mchog rdul yan cad nyid dben phyir// yod las med par 'gyur ba ste// bong bu'i ba langar mthong zhing // cha shas med cing cha shas can// phung po las ni phung can med// de bas yas kyi 'bras gyur pa// 'dini m+bu
169a1(1): ma'i 'bras byas bzhin// 'di na las med 'bras bu med// las kyi rngub 'ang yod pa yin// 'jig rten byed pas ma byas te// byed pa byed pa ma yin no// byed la byed pa yod na ni// 'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur// thub med byas pa'i nyes pa yis/ 
169a2(1): thub pa dris can du 'gyur/  ste las rgyud sna tshogs rnams// chu dang nam mapa' sa gnas pa'i// lus can kun la kun gnas te/ skye ba bzang po gnas su ste/ rim su 'gro ba yod pas na/ ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'a'o// dbang po so so bya ba yang // ji ltar dod
169a3(1): bar yul 'dzin te// 'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba// zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las// de bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig/ las gyis byas par gyur sems na// rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin// brag ca dang ni glog 'dra ba/ smig rgyu ri dgas sred pa ltar// dngos po rnal 'byor
169a4(1): rnal 'byor can// thog ma med nas bsags pa yi// mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis// sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang // sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags// dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin// yul rnams rmi lam phyir ldog dang // mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med// 
169a5(1): de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po// lag pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa// lus dpe med pa/ dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / se mo dos shin tu chas bstan las langs
169a6(1): thanas zag pa gcig tugapa nas sus moga'as pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ thegag sum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'galag ga chos pa bdag gi sa ni 'a nga ni 'dugs pa'i 'igs kyini rig pa'i spyod nub bad pa la gnas rdo na
169a7(1): ba'i dang bro rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ la 'byor gyi mkhan pos dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di ces smras so// rdo rje'i dbang po khyod kyi ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'phor dag tu cod pan dag la chos ston pa yin / 
169a8(1): de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyis bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas
169a9(1): sbron cig/ des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i 'di ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcul dbang sgyur zhing stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu rdzum
169a10(1): kyi rkang pa dang / dang gi gnal med 'ang gi gnas gyur te/ yang dag pa'i mtha la gnas pa spangs te/ sna tshogs kyi sus 'di bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ rgyal po'i tshogs kyi'i bar thams cad dang gug po sug pon spyod
169b1(1): rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ rgyal ba smos shig dge'o dge'o// cod pan can la khyad par du// chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa// stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa// sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/ rnam rtog spyod yul
169b2(1): yin shes na/ rnam tog don las phyir ldog pa/ 'thob nas rtog mthong nas te// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang / ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/ chos kyi ngon nyid gastan gyis/ rgyal song la de nyon cig byid kyi smin rlu banyid gad 'i
169b3(1): rnam pa 'gro ba 'di// mtshan bzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las// mtshan par rtog pa rnam mi rtog/ blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te// rtogs bya de yi khyad gyur pa// gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa// nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min// 
169b4(1): tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med// rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste// rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag/ shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sems tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya sems tsam yin pa ni// rtog tu tsam la shes yod min// sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid// gang
169b5(1): zag dag dang g.yo ba rnams// gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na// rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// rgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur// dgul bsam gtan spyod yul te// bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ 6#
169b6(1): rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste// sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te// mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing // rtag cing zhi ba bde ba brtan// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te// stug po'i zhing na
169b7(1): rnam par mdzes// rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med// stug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas/ bya// ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang
169b8(1): rdul gyi ste// rdul yag mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la// rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las me 'byung ngo // phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar
169b9(1): byad/ de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa// chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro// stug pa'i dbus na rnam par mdzes// skyed med rnam
169b10(1): ba sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir// 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas// lta ba thams cad zag byed pa// bdag med nyid la skyab su song // zhir gyur zhi ba
170a1(1): nas kya mams pa / na smyan smra /  mas/ rnam mig zun dang / 
170a2(1): byung dang // mi la ba bud byed par gago/ rtsub 'a nas sbyi grog mnos / drim 'igrong khyed spyod pa bzhinaphung 'das spyan spyod pa su pa// smig rgya mi dgas sred mtshungs su/ 
170a3(1): da rnas par ma // lcaga'i gzugs ga tshogs dang//  de pa'i mya di 'dzin/  srid ci 'azud ba s+ho// dang nam dun nab// bsro byed can
170b1(1): gzugs byas pa/ sbrum pan pa 'i 'bras byag / sbyin dang pa klog lhagasas/ grub san sa 'byod ngan sa lab mtho/ ma ya rdzogs pa'i 'tho' bzung yang/ 'dra 'dag ni nas
170b2(1): sgra lus/  na gyis nam zhe pa das nyid nams 'dug pa sa ma/ ga ga pa cig pa da pa
170b3(1): kye gnas ngan len byung g.yog/ 'o pa'i dpal rlabs 'dra ba ni/ kun gis la gnas pa yin / rlung gi ya ci ltar 'od pa la/ phan tshun dag tu spyod byas na/ dgal rlabs rnam sa la

208a7(1): bdan// de dag 'grogs yin/ lha dang lnga'i bumasogs// rnab sdu rgal pa'i sras rnams dang / drim pa'i rnam zhing / gnas 'amachung ma mtshag sa rnam pad
208a8(1): gzhan gyi rgol ba 'a'oms pa ste/ dpa' ba chen gargyad kyis bstan/ mig gzungs sam cid gcod pa/ dag ni phyogs kyi yan tshun no// shes rab can gyis yand kyi gdo sa/ rlom
208a9(1): dang canan 'gyur// ji nyid zas pams sa rnams dang/  rgyal po bsas tshan/ na lda gam sa/ na pa tham //  'i mangs
208b1(1): rnam sa rnams kyi sa pa te/ sras po'i chun mas ldan da/ na pa'i phyin rten rdzogs te// thul na myo rdza thun/ sa da
208b2(1): mchog/ thub pa kus kyi dam pa'o// sa stengasu thug pa'i byam la// rdo rje'i 'arnyi pos yang smras pa/ rtag pa zhus khyod kyis kyang / chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis/ dngos po rnams kyi rang bani

208b4(1): dngos po gcig gis shes byang 'gyur // des pa ji bzhin bsrubs pa 'i no// seMd pa'i me chom mngon zhes pa/ de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyis/ rang bzhin dadang pos sa
208b5(1): dab po yi skye thupas nyid/ dngos par yod pa pas byed/ da 'di dag su gzhi'i rnam pa ste/ nga kyi can gage'i rnam pa do// rgyas nas ma 'a pa byed sdoms 'di

208b7(1): can 'dag la ba nyon// ji ltar gyi'am ni'i bdag/ khyod dang byi ung bzlas pa// snyims bral mang po sna tshogs kyis/ nam mkham sa ni nga 'dod zhing/ rdzas pa can nam tshan ma yod tu
208b8(1): byi ba bsgra dbyangs snyand blangs pas// thub pacu ma ltos shig ces// phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung // snyems khral ma po sna tshogs su/ myi 'am rdzi dang 'gogs che zhing // byi ba se rgyas
209a1(1): rnams kyang gar byed ste// nyan thos de dag gyur na pa de/ rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong ba dag/ 'od srung nal 'byor da pazang can dang / rmeg gA'i cod pan la smos pa// nam tog byed pa'i snang bang kyi

210a1(1): sa'i bcan sa mkhas pa yang/ khyod la thams smin tu gnas / khyod la gsol pa 'debs pa ni/ rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dag/ rnam 'gyod can dang na la 'byo 'das/ grangs 'chang bu byed pams cad de/

210a9(1): rdo rje'i rnying 'ong mab tu bshad// ming ge'i tshe skad lus 'chang ba/ mtshan dang sum gsul gnyis dpo/ dpel byed pa 'a 'os brgyand pa'i lus// rdorje 'i tsu pos shin tu bstan// myi dka'i lnga la 'jas

210b1(1): ngan ldan par// rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan// rig pa dpa des ta/ sha Tha ke shrI lnga 'o mi/ sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa'i// ka dbyings kyis thub pa rnam par gzug/ rings dang dal ba byed pa'i tshig/ rab cing spyad/

211a1(1): khyad par byed pas na// bag chags spos pas 'phags pa de// yun ring gnas ngan lend pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing // rnam shes rnams las rab tu 'byung // lha/ rdzas tshul

219b8(1): btang snyoms 'di dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mi ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la 'ang rub cing / ci rigs par ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin
219b9(1): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa drag pa yin te/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams
220a1(1): cad yongs su tshol ba la mos pa rlabs po che dang / mos pa chen po dang / mos paba' mos dge ba'i dra ba sna tshogs bskrun par mos so// tan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis
220a2(1): yongs su spong bar mos so// theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par mos so// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po btang ba yid la byed pa mi 'dor bar mos so// rang gi rtog cing
220a3(1): grub kyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par mos te/ bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dmigs pa can lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang / sems
220a4(1): can thams cad kyis de myos pa dang dbral bar mi nus so// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de lad
220a5(1): bstan par bya ba de ston to// gang du skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis dus gang dang / nyi tshod gang dang / yul gzhan gang dang / sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud gang dang gang la snyed kyi 'arta ba bzhin du
220a6(1): ci rigs par chos ston kyang mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems
220a7(1): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de rtag tu brtson pa mi 'dor/ dge ba'i rtsa yang dag par sgrub cing sbyor bas ngoms mi myong / 
220a8(1): byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsom pa la rtul cing bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos smra ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gan du 'gro la/ yongs su 'dri ba dang / bsnyen bkur
220b1(1): ba dang / mchod pa'i las dang / bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / 
220b2(1): sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / sems can
220b3(1): gyi spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir te/ brtson 'grus de tshad med par byas pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di
220b4(1): dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas sems can tshad med pa
220b5(1): gzung mo ju ji d+hi de zhi ga shegs pa rdzu 'jus kyis tha sa kyi ldan ma da 'phrul gyu ga tu gyus pa ma klung rdzu mu sa pa med/ thams na
220b6(1): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ste/ mngon par phyogs kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med cing thams cad du rgyu tha nam mkhas klas pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
220b7(1): pa brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dnga'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dran pa phun sum tshogs shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ 
220b8(1): de'i dran pa de brjod pa med pa yin/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa yin no// de nang gi lus la
220b9(1): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus
221a1(1): / le lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi
221a2(1): tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyon mo/ de bzhin du phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / 
221a3(1): gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i sems dang
221a4(1): phyi nang gi sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid
221a5(1): sgom ste/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa mi sdug pa'i rnam yid la byed cing sbyor ro// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir lus kyi las legs par sbyor
221a6(1): ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do// tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ !stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi
221a7(1): de tshor ba thams cad yid bya na rgyun gcod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do// sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par
221a8(1): yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyis sems kyang mi brjod la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag pa'i sgrub pa'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do// chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ smon
221b1(1): pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing skye ro yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / 
221b2(1): dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la de med pa yin no// / 
221b3(1): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyis mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / deH/ 
221b4(1): byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / dbang po dang nga / khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / 
221b5(1): bag la nyal ba dang / kun nAs dkris pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin par gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu
221b6(1): brgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang /  zhing du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa dang
221b7(1): pha ma dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa la dran pa'i dbang po thogs pa med cing rmongs pa med pa yin te/ thams cad du phyed par lung ste/ 
221b8(1): po 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag du rgyun mi chad pa
221b9(1): shes rab spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyi 'od dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / shes rab kyi dpyod pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / zab pa'i shes rab dang
222a1(1): nges par rtog pa'i shes rab dang / mi thub pa'i shes rab dang / zil terkye gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag
222a2(1): dka' ba'i shes rab dang / yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab lhag pa'i shes rab dang / bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi lung mnos pa med pa'i shes rab dang / 
222a3(1): thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba'i shes rab can te/ thos nas kyang shes rab kyis khong du chud cing rtogs te/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bsti stang byed cing thos pa tshol la thos pa snying por byed/ 
222a4(1): ba yin/ thos pa bsag pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos la dga' bas dga' la mos pa yin// dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te/ de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang
222a5(1): yongs su mi gtong ba med do// de bla ma la rim gro bya ba mi byed pa gang yang med do// de sdug bsngal gyi phung po mi bzod pa'i gang yang med do// de chos 'dod pa des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad
222a6(1): pa gcig nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la ni ma yin no// chos kyi tshig gcig la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor
222a7(1): \u0f7flos sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pa ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mnyam pa la shin tu dga' ba yin no// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no// tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
222a8(1): gzhan dag la ston par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du
222a9(1): 'jug pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ brgya'on dang / 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi gtan
222b1(1): rab tu ston pa la dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas bsti stang du byed cing chos nyan to// bsti stang
222b2(1): du byed cing gzhan la ston to// de ltar mngon par brtson pas tshegs chung ngur de lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// de lhas yongs su
222b3(1): bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgo nges pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad bdag nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no// de shes chab kyi snang ba'i sgo zad mi shes pas spang ba ma
222b4(1): yin no// de chos kyi snang ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la da med pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa
222b5(1): dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / lan ma thob dang bcas pa dang lan ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag 'a med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig las bab
222b6(1): 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa
222b7(1): dang rnga zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa shes pa dag la de'i shes rab de ston gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthang dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags
222b8(1): pa med cing sgrib pa med de thams cad du thogs pa med do// phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstan kyang thug pa med do// dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgom
222b9(1): pas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis sgo gcig las chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing / chos kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag
223a1(1): spyang ba spyod pa ni rtag rgyun mchod pa ma gyis gyigamamadon du ma mam rung ba na dusas ba'in te/ kyis sa rung ba shing da
223a2(1): pa la zhog/ dben pa la 'bab/ dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor lnga brtson te/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa me pa dang / rnam par
223a3(1): pa'i sgo gsum po 'di sgom mo// gad pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi yul ma yin ning mi rtogs pa dang / dmigs par lta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' 'thams cad kyis rtogs pa ni
223a4(1): 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgoms pas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa'i kun tu skye'o// chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob po bdud kyi yul
223a5(1): las kyang shin tu 'da'o// ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sgrib pa dang chod pa dang kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba dang nyon mongs pa dang mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do// 
223a6(1): desgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu thob cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtson pas chos zab mo ston pa yin no// don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'phrul rton pa ma yin no// ye shes la
223a7(1): rton pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no// nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi dran pa'i don la rton pa ma yin no// chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no// sems can
223a8(1): ma cang kyi tan du gyur ba g.yin to/ yi ga dang rnam par rtog pa'i chags zhes pa la don la ston pa bstan nas myongs su thar bar byed do// rnam pa shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags nan lam yon / 
223b1(1): la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags zhen pa la rton pa nyid bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// rnam par rtogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags zhen 'a
223b2(1): la mtshan ma med pa la bstan nas yongs su thar par byed do// khams gsum la chags zhan pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do/ rgya 'don chags kyi chags zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i
223b3(1): rnam pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// zhe sdang spyod pa la chags zhen pa la byams pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// gti mug spyod pa la chags zhan pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan
223b4(1): nas yongs su thar bar byed do// sar sna la chags zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su brar bar byed do// ngan pa'i ngang tshul la chags zhen pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b5(1): bstan nas yongs su blar bar byed do// gnod sems la chags zhen pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// le lo la chags zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas
223b6(1): yongs su tha ro bar byed do// g.yeng ba la chags zhen pa la bstam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// 'chal ba'i shes rab la chags zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas
223b7(1): yongs su thar bar byed do// so so'i skye ba'i sa la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// phyin ci log la chags zhen pa la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal
223b8(1): ba dang bdag med pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar bur byed do// sgrib pa dang chod pa dang kun nas dkris pa dang / zhwa ba thams cad la chags zhen pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par
223b9(1): zla ra bstan nas yongs su thur bar byed do// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su brar bar byed do// de chos yang dag par blangs pa
224a1(1): 'di dang ldan pas byang chu thub pa na bzhi ga shegs pa rnas par tshul pa man pa med pa zhes bya /  'a 'a pa sa/  na pa mo pa des 'jugs/ ngan/ 
224a2(1): tu mthar thug ste/ dba' rlabs med la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos por gyur cing zab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpag bka' ba yin sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
224a3(1): ba nyid kyi rjes su song ba ste/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te rnyog pa med pa'i shin tu yongs su dag pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byed pas zad mi shes
224a4(1): pa yin/ bstan pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin nam mkha'i dbying bu yang dag par 'du ba yin ste/ dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos
224a5(1): thams cad snang ba dang ldan pas gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun pa yin te/ thams cad las byung zhing chos thams cad
224a6(1): kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gnal ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin/ mya ngan las 'da' pa la bab pa yin to/ shin tu mgyur thug cing shin tu mthar byin pa 'di ni bu ma
224a7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bcugacig pa'o// / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ste shes lhun len pa yin te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang / 
224a8(1): shes la 'thab pa dang / ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i ye shes de ni nyags pa med pa 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su srung ba byas pa las nges par byung ba'o// thams cad mabyon pa'i zhes
224a9(1): kyis ngas 'ab tsud pa blo dang 'ang pa'i te/  thams cad mkhyen pa gzhes kyis na' pa pyod pa'i sgodang dran pas 'dod chag dang tho rgya ma'i sems paya 'dod dga' dang bcas pa'i sems su'ang
224b1(1): dag 'a ji lta ba bani du rab tu shes so// 'dod mag 'a dang bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa jig pa bzhin du dang tu shes so// de bzhi du 'i ldang dang
224b2(1): bcas pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khor byed dang 'acas pa

224b5(1): dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang / chung ngu
224b6(1): dang cher gyur pa dang / mtha' dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems dang / tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang /
